636.quote: Everything has been figured out, except how to live.
636.author: Jean-Paul Sartre

637.quote: Life in abundance comes only through great love.
637.author: Elbert Hubbard

638.quote: Nearly all the best things that came to me in life have been unexpected, unplanned by me.
638.author: Carl Sandburg

639.quote: Get correct views of life, and learn to see the world in its true light. It will enable you to live pleasantly, to do good, and, when summoned away, to leave without regret.
639.author: Robert E. Lee

640.quote: Life is a lively process of becoming.
640.author: Douglas MacArthur

641.quote: I arise in the morning torn between a desire to improve the world and a desire to enjoy the world. This makes it hard to plan the day.
641.author: E. B. White

642.quote: Life is a series of collisions with the future; it is not the sum of what we have been, but what we yearn to be.
642.author: Jose Ortega y Gasset

643.quote: The chief danger in life is that you may take too many precautions.
643.author: Alfred Adler

644.quote: Our entire life - consists ultimately in accepting ourselves as we are.
644.author: Jean Anouilh

645.quote: Life leaps like a geyser for those who drill through the rock of inertia.
645.author: Alexis Carrel

646.quote: Nobody got where they are today by living for tomorrow.
646.author: Tom Wilson

647.quote: The purpose of life is a life of purpose.
647.author: Robert Byrne

648.quote: Don't let life discourage you; everyone who got where he is had to begin where he was.
648.author: Richard L. Evans

649.quote: Wrong life cannot be lived rightly.
649.author: Theodor Adorno

650.quote: The best path through life is the highway.
650.author: Henri Frederic Amiel

651.quote: Who will tell whether one happy moment of love or the joy of breathing or walking on a bright morning and smelling the fresh air, is not worth all the suffering and effort which life implies.
651.author: Erich Fromm

652.quote: Let life happen to you. Believe me: life is in the right, always.
652.author: Rainer Maria Rilke

653.quote: We are here to add what we can to life, not to get what we can from life.
653.author: William Osler

654.quote: I am an artist... I am here to live out loud.
654.author: Emile Zola

655.quote: With the past, I have nothing to do; nor with the future. I live now.
655.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

656.quote: Life is the art of drawing sufficient conclusions from insufficient premises.
656.author: Samuel Butler

657.quote: The golden moments in the stream of life rush past us, and we see nothing but sand; the angels come to visit us, and we only know them when they are gone.
657.author: George Eliot

658.quote: Find ecstasy in life; the mere sense of living is joy enough.
658.author: Emily Dickinson

659.quote: I argue thee that love is life. And life hath immortality.
659.author: Emily Dickinson

660.quote: To live is so startling it leaves little time for anything else.
660.author: Emily Dickinson

661.quote: Life consists not in holding good cards but in playing those you hold well.
661.author: Josh Billings

662.quote: Life is very short and what we have to do must be done in the now.
662.author: Audre Lorde

663.quote: People living deeply have no fear of death.
663.author: Anais Nin

664.quote: For the happiest life, days should be rigorously planned, nights left open to chance.
664.author: Mignon McLaughlin

665.quote: The most exhausting thing in life is being insincere.
665.author: Anne Morrow Lindbergh

666.quote: You have succeeded in life when all you really want is only what you really need.
666.author: Vernon Howard

667.quote: I look back on my life like a good day's work, it was done and I am satisfied with it.
667.author: Grandma Moses

668.quote: Life is a succession of lessons which must be lived to be understood. All is riddle, and the key to a riddle is another riddle.
668.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

669.quote: Remember when life's path is steep to keep your mind even.
669.author: Horace

670.quote: To me, if life boils down to one thing, it's movement. To live is to keep moving.
670.author: Jerry Seinfeld

671.quote: Ships that pass in the night, and speak each other in passing, only a signal shown, and a distant voice in the darkness; So on the ocean of life, we pass and speak one another, only a look and a voice, then darkness again and a silence.
671.author: Henry Wadsworth Longfellow

672.quote: Make space in your life for the things that matter, for family and friends, love and generosity, fun and joy. Without this, you will burn out in mid-career and wonder where your life went.
672.author: Jonathan Sacks

673.quote: The man who has no inner-life is a slave to his surroundings.
673.author: Henri Frederic Amiel

674.quote: Life is painting a picture, not doing a sum.
674.author: Oliver Wendell Holmes, Jr.

675.quote: Maybe that's what life is... a wink of the eye and winking stars.
675.author: Jack Kerouac

676.quote: Growth is the only evidence of life.
676.author: John Henry Newman

677.quote: Life is like a trumpet - if you don't put anything into it, you don't get anything out of it.
677.author: William Christopher Handy

678.quote: Life must be lived as play.
678.author: Plato

679.quote: Life is a lot like jazz... it's best when you improvise.
679.author: George Gershwin

680.quote: Execute every act of thy life as though it were thy last.
680.author: Marcus Aurelius

681.quote: Life is a gift, given in trust - like a child.
681.author: Anne Morrow Lindbergh

682.quote: The greatest gift of life is friendship, and I have received it.
682.author: Hubert H. Humphrey

683.quote: Keep love in your heart. A life without it is like a sunless garden when the flowers are dead.
683.author: Oscar Wilde

684.quote: Life is 10% what happens to you and 90% how you react to it.
684.author: Charles R. Swindoll

685.quote: There is only one happiness in this life, to love and be loved.
685.author: George Sand

686.quote: Do not take life too seriously. You will never get out of it alive.
686.author: Elbert Hubbard

687.quote: I cannot even imagine where I would be today were it not for that handful of friends who have given me a heart full of joy. Let's face it, friends make life a lot more fun.
687.author: Charles R. Swindoll

688.quote: Your work is going to fill a large part of your life, and the only way to be truly satisfied is to do what you believe is great work. And the only way to do great work is to love what you do. If you haven't found it yet, keep looking. Don't settle. As with all matters of the heart, you'll know when you find it.
688.author: Steve Jobs

689.quote: Be happy for this moment. This moment is your life.
689.author: Omar Khayyam

690.quote: A hero is someone who has given his or her life to something bigger than oneself.
690.author: Joseph Campbell

691.quote: My mission in life is not merely to survive, but to thrive; and to do so with some passion, some compassion, some humor, and some style.
691.author: Maya Angelou

692.quote: True friendship multiplies the good in life and divides its evils. Strive to have friends, for life without friends is like life on a desert island... to find one real friend in a lifetime is good fortune; to keep him is a blessing.
692.author: Baltasar Gracian

693.quote: Today I choose life. Every morning when I wake up I can choose joy, happiness, negativity, pain... To feel the freedom that comes from being able to continue to make mistakes and choices - today I choose to feel life, not to deny my humanity but embrace it.
693.author: Kevyn Aucoin

694.quote: However difficult life may seem, there is always something you can do and succeed at.
694.author: Stephen Hawking

695.quote: Clouds come floating into my life, no longer to carry rain or usher storm, but to add color to my sunset sky.
695.author: Rabindranath Tagore

696.quote: Choose a job you love, and you will never have to work a day in your life.
696.author: Confucius

697.quote: Education is not preparation for life; education is life itself.
697.author: John Dewey

698.quote: The best thing to hold onto in life is each other.
698.author: Audrey Hepburn

699.quote: God gave us the gift of life; it is up to us to give ourselves the gift of living well.
699.author: Voltaire

700.quote: Music is a moral law. It gives soul to the universe, wings to the mind, flight to the imagination, and charm and gaiety to life and to everything.
700.author: Plato

701.quote: Your time is limited, so don't waste it living someone else's life. Don't be trapped by dogma - which is living with the results of other people's thinking. Don't let the noise of others' opinions drown out your own inner voice. And most important, have the courage to follow your heart and intuition.
701.author: Steve Jobs

702.quote: Always remember that you are absolutely unique. Just like everyone else.
702.author: Margaret Mead

703.quote: If you haven't got anything nice to say about anybody, come sit next to me.
703.author: Alice Roosevelt Longworth

704.quote: A woman's mind is cleaner than a man's: She changes it more often.
704.author: Oliver Herford

705.quote: Do not take life too seriously. You will never get out of it alive.
705.author: Elbert Hubbard

706.quote: People who think they know everything are a great annoyance to those of us who do.
706.author: Isaac Asimov

707.quote: No man has a good enough memory to be a successful liar.
707.author: Abraham Lincoln

708.quote: We are all here on earth to help others; what on earth the others are here for I don't know.
708.author: W. H. Auden

709.quote: Go to Heaven for the climate, Hell for the company.
709.author: Mark Twain

710.quote: I can resist everything except temptation.
710.author: Oscar Wilde

711.quote: Get your facts first, then you can distort them as you please.
711.author: Mark Twain

712.quote: Roses are red, violets are blue, I'm schizophrenic, and so am I.
712.author: Oscar Levant

713.quote: A day without sunshine is like, you know, night.
713.author: Steve Martin

714.quote: I'm sorry, if you were right, I'd agree with you.

715.quote: Too much agreement kills a chat.
715.author: Eldridge Cleaver

716.quote: Wine is constant proof that God loves us and loves to see us happy.
716.author: Benjamin Franklin

717.quote: A successful man is one who makes more money than his wife can spend. A successful woman is one who can find such a man.
717.author: Lana Turner

718.quote: One advantage of talking to yourself is that you know at least somebody's listening.
718.author: Franklin P. Jones

719.quote: I love deadlines. I like the whooshing sound they make as they fly by.
719.author: Douglas Adams

720.quote: If you could kick the person in the pants responsible for most of your trouble, you wouldn't sit for a month.

721.quote: I believe that if life gives you lemons, you should make lemonade... And try to find somebody whose life has given them vodka, and have a party.

722.quote: When you are courting a nice girl an hour seems like a second. When you sit on a red-hot cinder a second seems like an hour. That's relativity.

723.quote: Procrastination is the art of keeping up with yesterday.
723.author: Don Marquis

724.quote: Laziness is nothing more than the habit of resting before you get tired.
724.author: Jules Renard

725.quote: Behind every great man is a woman rolling her eyes.
725.author: Jim Carrey

726.quote: What I am looking for is a blessing not in disguise.
726.author: Jerome K. Jerome

727.quote: I may be drunk, Miss, but in the morning I will be sober and you will still be ugly.
727.author: Winston Churchill

728.quote: My fake plants died because I did not pretend to water them.
728.author: Mitch Hedberg

729.quote: If I were two-faced, would I be wearing this one?
729.author: Abraham Lincoln

730.quote: If this is coffee, please bring me some tea; but if this is tea, please bring me some coffee.
730.author: Abraham Lincoln

731.quote: We are all born mad. Some remain so.
731.author: Samuel Beckett

732.quote: Frisbeetarianism is the belief that when you die, your soul goes up on the roof and gets stuck.
732.author: George Carlin

733.quote: Drawing on my fine command of the English language, I said nothing.
733.author: Robert Benchley

734.quote: The four building blocks of the universe are fire, water, gravel and vinyl.
734.author: Dave Barry

735.quote: People say that life is the thing, but I prefer reading.
735.author: Logan Pearsall Smith

736.quote: I refuse to join any club that would have me as a member.
736.author: Groucho Marx

737.quote: Housework can't kill you, but why take a chance?
737.author: Phyllis Diller

738.quote: All generalizations are false, including this one.
738.author: Mark Twain

739.quote: I looked up my family tree and found out I was the sap.
739.author: Rodney Dangerfield

740.quote: I want my children to have all the things I couldn't afford. Then I want to move in with them.
740.author: Phyllis Diller

741.quote: I never said most of the things I said.
741.author: Yogi Berra

742.quote: Don't talk about yourself; it will be done when you leave.
742.author: Wilson Mizner

743.quote: When we talk to God, we're praying. When God talks to us, we're schizophrenic.

744.quote: An idea isn't responsible for the people who believe in it.
744.author: Don Marquis

745.quote: When we ask for advice, we are usually looking for an accomplice.
745.author: Saul Bellow

747.quote: Society is like a stew. If you don't stir it up every once in a while then a layer of scum floats to the top.

748.quote: If I want to knock a story off the front page, I just change my hairstyle.
748.author: Hillary Clinton

749.quote: Only the mediocre are always at their best.
749.author: Jean Giraudoux

750.quote: My grandmother started walking five miles a day when she was sixty. She's ninety-seven now, and we don't know where the hell she is.
750.author: Ellen DeGeneres

751.quote: I was eating in a Chinese restaurant downtown. There was a dish called Mother and Child Reunion. It's chicken and eggs. And I said, I gotta use that one.
751.author: Paul Simon

752.quote: Why do they call it rush hour when nothing moves?
752.author: Robin Williams

753.quote: It's amazing that the amount of news that happens in the world every day always just exactly fits the newspaper.
753.author: Jerry Seinfeld

754.quote: If a cluttered desk is the sign of a cluttered mind, what is the significance of a clean desk?
754.author: Laurence J. Peter

755.quote: If truth is beauty, how come no one has their hair done in the library?
755.author: Lily Tomlin

756.quote: By all means let's be open-minded, but not so open-minded that our brains drop out.
756.author: Richard Dawkins

757.quote: I would never die for my beliefs because I might be wrong.
757.author: Bertrand Russell

758.quote: Gambling: The sure way of getting nothing for something.
758.author: Wilson Mizner

760.quote: I haven't spoken to my wife in years. I didn't want to interrupt her.
760.author: Rodney Dangerfield

761.quote: I'm undaunted in my quest to amuse myself by constantly changing my hair.
761.author: Hillary Clinton

762.quote: If at first you don't succeed, find out if the loser gets anything.

763.quote: Laugh and the world laughs with you, snore and you sleep alone.
763.author: Anthony Burgess

764.quote: A government that robs Peter to pay Paul can always depend on the support of Paul.
764.author: George Bernard Shaw

765.quote: Prejudice is a great time saver. You can form opinions without having to get the facts.
765.author: E. B. White

766.quote: All right everyone, line up alphabetically according to your height.
766.author: Casey Stengel

767.quote: Everything I like is either illegal, immoral or fattening.

768.quote: It's simple, if it jiggles, it's fat.

769.quote: Don't forget Mother's Day. Or as they call it in Beverly Hills, Dad's Third Wife Day.
769.author: Jay Leno

770.quote: Happiness is having a large, loving, caring, close-knit family in another city.
770.author: George Burns

771.quote: I found there was only one way to look thin: hang out with fat people.
771.author: Rodney Dangerfield

773.quote: Between two evils, I always pick the one I never tried before.
773.author: Mae West

774.quote: Children are smarter than any of us. Know how I know that? I don't know one child with a full time job and children.

775.quote: I no doubt deserved my enemies, but I don't believe I deserved my friends.

776.quote: Well, if I called the wrong number, why did you answer the phone?
776.author: James Thurber

777.quote: If you want a guarantee, buy a toaster.
777.author: Clint Eastwood

778.quote: I wanna make a jigsaw puzzle that's 40,000 pieces. And when you finish it, it says 'go outside.'
778.author: Demetri Martin

779.quote: Man cannot live by bread alone; he must have peanut butter.
779.author: James A. Garfield

780.quote: The one thing you shouldn't do is try to tell a cab driver how to get somewhere.
780.author: Jimmy Fallon

781.quote: I don't need you to remind me of my age. I have a bladder to do that for me.

782.quote: The way my luck is running, if I was a politician I would be honest.
782.author: Rodney Dangerfield

783.quote: A pessimist is a person who has had to listen to too many optimists.
783.author: Don Marquis

784.quote: There is nothing in the world that I loathe more than group activity, that communal bath where the hairy and slippery mix in a multiplication of mediocrity.

785.quote: She was a handsome woman of forty-five and would remain so for many years.
785.author: J. B. Priestley

786.quote: Progress is man's ability to complicate simplicity.
786.author: Thor Heyerdahl

787.quote: I'm writing a book. I've got the page numbers done.
787.author: Steven Wright

788.quote: If God wanted us to bend over he'd put diamonds on the floor.
788.author: Joan Rivers

789.quote: It all started when my dog began getting free roll over minutes.
789.author: Jay London

790.quote: Tact is the ability to describe others as they see themselves.
790.author: Abraham Lincoln

791.quote: A sure cure for seasickness is to sit under a tree.
791.author: Spike Milligan

792.quote: If I had to live my life again, I'd make the same mistakes, only sooner.
792.author: Tallulah Bankhead

793.quote: It is easy for me to love myself, but for ladies to do it is another question altogether.
793.author: Johnny Vegas

794.quote: We owe a lot to Thomas Edison - if it wasn't for him, we'd be watching television by candlelight.
794.author: Milton Berle

795.quote: I love to go to Washington - if only to be near my money.
795.author: Bob Hope

796.quote: The reports of my death have been greatly exaggerated.
796.author: Mark Twain

797.quote: One of the disadvantages of wine is that it makes a man mistake words for thoughts.
797.author: Samuel Johnson

799.quote: You can lead a man to Congress, but you can't make him think.
799.author: Milton Berle

800.quote: Everybody talks about the weather, but nobody does anything about it.
800.author: Charles Dudley Warner

801.quote: If men knew how women pass the time when they are alone, they'd never marry.
801.author: O. Henry

802.quote: Common sense is the collection of prejudices acquired by age eighteen.
802.author: Albert Einstein

803.quote: Cure for an obsession: get another one.
803.author: Mason Cooley

804.quote: As for our majority... one is enough.
804.author: Benjamin Disraeli

805.quote: I wear a necklace, cause I wanna know when I'm upside down.
805.author: Mitch Hedberg

806.quote: All men are equal before fish.
806.author: Herbert Hoover

807.quote: I like long walks, especially when they are taken by people who annoy me.
807.author: Fred Allen

808.quote: Every cloud has its silver lining but it is sometimes a little difficult to get it to the mint.
808.author: Don Marquis

809.quote: I have tried to know absolutely nothing about a great many things, and I have succeeded fairly well.
809.author: Robert Benchley

810.quote: I recorded my hair this morning, tonight I'm watching the highlights.
810.author: Jay London

811.quote: I was so naive as a kid I used to sneak behind the barn and do nothing.
811.author: Johnny Carson

812.quote: If it weren't for Philo T. Farnsworth, inventor of television, we'd still be eating frozen radio dinners.
812.author: Johnny Carson

813.quote: I could sooner reconcile all Europe than two women.
813.author: Louis XIV

814.quote: Working with Julie Andrews is like getting hit over the head with a valentine.
814.author: Christopher Plummer

815.quote: I saw a woman wearing a sweatshirt with Guess on it. I said, Thyroid problem?
815.author: Arnold Schwarzenegger

816.quote: Reality continues to ruin my life.
816.author: Bill Watterson

817.quote: The fascination of shooting as a sport depends almost wholly on whether you are at the right or wrong end of the gun.
817.author: P. G. Wodehouse

819.quote: I drank some boiling water because I wanted to whistle.
819.author: Mitch Hedberg

820.quote: Every time I see an adult on a bicycle, I no longer despair for the future of the human race.
820.author: H. G. Wells

821.quote: Older people shouldn't eat health food, they need all the preservatives they can get.
821.author: Robert Orben

822.quote: I've always wanted to go to Switzerland to see what the army does with those wee red knives.
822.author: Billy Connolly

823.quote: People always ask me, 'Were you funny as a child?' Well, no, I was an accountant.
823.author: Ellen DeGeneres

824.quote: There are lots of people who mistake their imagination for their memory.
824.author: Josh Billings

825.quote: I have a new philosophy. I'm only going to dread one day at a time.
825.author: Charles M. Schulz

826.quote: I think the eyes flirt most. There are so many ways to use them.
826.author: Anna Held

827.quote: Because of their size, parents may be difficult to discipline properly.
827.author: P. J. O'Rourke

828.quote: The last time I saw him he was walking down lover's lane holding his own hand.
828.author: Fred Allen

829.quote: My mother was against me being an actress - until I introduced her to Frank Sinatra.
829.author: Angie Dickinson

830.quote: I cannot sing, dance or act; what else would I be but a talk show host.
830.author: David Letterman

831.quote: We'll love you just the way you are if you're perfect.
831.author: Alanis Morissette

832.quote: Whoever is my relative, I will not be nice to them.
832.author: George Lopez

833.quote: I have yet to hear a man ask for advice on how to combine marriage and a career.
833.author: Gloria Steinem

834.quote: My father would take me to the playground, and put me on mood swings.
834.author: Jay London

835.quote: Smoking kills. If you're killed, you've lost a very important part of your life.
835.author: Brooke Shields

836.quote: You're only as good as your last haircut.
836.author: Fran Lebowitz

837.quote: Progress was all right. Only it went on too long.
837.author: James Thurber

838.quote: The trouble with having an open mind, of course, is that people will insist on coming along and trying to put things in it.

839.quote: As a child my family's menu consisted of two choices: take it or leave it.

840.quote: Be thankful we're not getting all the government we're paying for.
840.author: Will Rogers

841.quote: If at first you don't succeed... so much for skydiving.
841.author: Henny Youngman

842.quote: I always wanted to be somebody, but now I realize I should have been more specific.

843.quote: Tragedy is when I cut my finger. Comedy is when you fall into an open sewer and die.

844.quote: A James Cagney love scene is one where he lets the other guy live.

845.quote: You can do anything with bayonets except sit on them.

846.quote: This suspense is terrible. I hope it will last.

847.quote: Cleanliness becomes more important when godliness is unlikely.

848.quote: It is even harder for the average ape to believe that he has descended from man.

849.quote: I cook with wine, sometimes I even add it to the food.

850.quote: Never have more children than you have car windows.

851.quote: Originality is the fine art of remembering what you hear but forgetting where you heard it.

852.quote: The only time I ever enjoyed ironing was the day I accidentally got gin in the steam iron.

853.quote: The best measure of a man's honesty isn't his income tax return. It's the zero adjust on his bathroom scale.

854.quote: Lead us not into temptation. Just tell us where it is; we'll find it.

855.quote: Money won't buy happiness, but it will pay the salaries of a large research staff to study the problem.

856.quote: Anytime you see a turtle up on top of a fence post, you know he had some help.

857.quote: May the forces of evil become confused on the way to your house.

858.quote: I'm like old wine. They don't bring me out very often - but I'm well preserved.

859.quote: All my children inherited perfect pitch.

860.quote: Television has brought back murder into the home - where it belongs.

861.quote: He looks as though he's been weaned on a pickle.
861.author: Alice Roosevelt Longworth

862.quote: I have a wonderful make-up crew. They're the same people restoring the Statue of Liberty.

863.quote: The tax collector must love poor people, he's creating so many of them.
863.author: Bill Vaughan

864.quote: Fashions have done more harm than revolutions.

865.quote: As far as I'm concerned, 'whom' is a word that was invented to make everyone sound like a butler.

866.quote: If you cannot get rid of the family skeleton, you may as well make it dance.
866.author: George Bernard Shaw

867.quote: Flattery is like cologne water, to be smelt, not swallowed.

869.quote: California is a fine place to live - if you happen to be an orange.
869.author: Fred Allen

870.quote: I'm the only man in the world with a marriage licence made out to whom it may concern.
870.author: Mickey Rooney

871.quote: I don't deserve this award, but I have arthritis and I don't deserve that either.

872.quote: A child of five would understand this. Send someone to fetch a child of five.
872.author: Groucho Marx

873.quote: You can always tell when a man's well informed. His views are pretty much like your own.

874.quote: To label me an intellectual is a misunderstanding of what that is.

875.quote: I don't think anyone should write their autobiography until after they're dead.
875.author: Samuel Goldwyn

876.quote: What do I know of man's destiny? I could tell you more about radishes.
876.author: Samuel Beckett

877.quote: Thinking is one thing no one has ever been able to tax.

878.quote: I'm thankful for the three ounce Ziploc bag, so that I have somewhere to put my savings.

879.quote: The way taxes are, you might as well marry for love.
879.author: Joe E. Lewis

881.quote: After all is said and done, sit down.
881.author: Bill Copeland

882.quote: O Lord, help me to be pure, but not yet.
882.author: Saint Augustine

883.quote: So, where's the Cannes Film Festival being held this year?
883.author: Christina Aguilera

884.quote: Forty for you, sixty for me. And equal partners we will be.
884.author: Joan Rivers

885.quote: A two-year-old is kind of like having a blender, but you don't have a top for it.
885.author: Jerry Seinfeld

886.quote: I have never been hurt by what I have not said.
886.author: Calvin Coolidge

887.quote: When I eventually met Mr. Right I had no idea that his first name was Always.
887.author: Rita Rudner

888.quote: I never liked you, and I always will.
888.author: Samuel Goldwyn

889.quote: If two wrongs don't make a right, try three.
889.author: Laurence J. Peter

890.quote: The first time I sang in the church choir; two hundred people changed their religion.
890.author: Fred Allen

891.quote: I spent a year in that town, one Sunday.
891.author: George Burns

892.quote: If you live to be one hundred, you've got it made. Very few people die past that age.
892.author: George Burns

893.quote: A committee is a group that keeps minutes and loses hours.
893.author: Milton Berle

894.quote: I saw a stationery store move.
894.author: Jay London

895.quote: My definition of an intellectual is someone who can listen to the William Tell Overture without thinking of the Lone Ranger.
895.author: Billy Connolly

896.quote: I believe in rules. Sure I do. If there weren't any rules, how could you break them?
896.author: Leo Durocher

897.quote: Memories are like mulligatawny soup in a cheap restaurant. It is best not to stir them.
897.author: P. G. Wodehouse

898.quote: One man is as good as another until he has written a book.
898.author: Benjamin Jowett

899.quote: There's one thing about baldness, it's neat.
899.author: Don Herold

900.quote: What after all, is a halo? It's only one more thing to keep clean.
900.author: Christopher Fry

901.quote: If I knew for a certainty that a man was coming to my house with the conscious design of doing me good, I should run for my life.
901.author: Henry David Thoreau

902.quote: Before I refuse to take your questions, I have an opening statement.
902.author: Ronald Reagan

903.quote: I am not a member of any organized political party. I am a Democrat.
903.author: Will Rogers

904.quote: I never expected to see the day when girls would get sunburned in the places they now do.
904.author: Will Rogers

905.quote: The superfluous, a very necessary thing.
905.author: Voltaire

906.quote: I love Mickey Mouse more than any woman I have ever known.
906.author: Walt Disney

907.quote: They say marriages are made in Heaven. But so is thunder and lightning.
907.author: Clint Eastwood

908.quote: A nickel ain't worth a dime anymore.
908.author: Yogi Berra

909.quote: If it's the Psychic Network why do they need a phone number?
909.author: Robin Williams

910.quote: If women ran the world we wouldn't have wars, just intense negotiations every 28 days.
910.author: Robin Williams

911.quote: A word to the wise is infuriating.
911.author: Hunter S. Thompson

912.quote: I have had a perfectly wonderful evening, but this wasn't it.
912.author: Groucho Marx

913.quote: The next time you have a thought... let it go.
913.author: Ron White

914.quote: I knew I was an unwanted baby when I saw that my bath toys were a toaster and a radio.
914.author: Joan Rivers

915.quote: It takes considerable knowledge just to realize the extent of your own ignorance.
915.author: Thomas Sowell

916.quote: I used to be Snow White, but I drifted.
916.author: Mae West

917.quote: I'm spending a year dead for tax reasons.
917.author: Douglas Adams

918.quote: I failed to make the chess team because of my height.
918.author: Woody Allen

919.quote: The chief function of the body is to carry the brain around.
919.author: Thomas A. Edison

920.quote: Boy, those French: they have a different word for everything!
920.author: Steve Martin

921.quote: There's a great power in words, if you don't hitch too many of them together.
921.author: Josh Billings

922.quote: I was a vegetarian until I started leaning toward the sunlight.
922.author: Rita Rudner

923.quote: I'm for whatever gets you through the night.
923.author: Frank Sinatra

924.quote: There cannot be a crisis next week. My schedule is already full.
924.author: Henry A. Kissinger

925.quote: I read part of it all the way through.
925.author: Samuel Goldwyn

926.quote: That's my only goal. Surround myself with funny people, and make sure everyone has a good time and works hard.
926.author: Joe Rogan

927.quote: Any girl can be glamorous. All you have to do is stand still and look stupid.
927.author: Hedy Lamarr

928.quote: Life is hard. After all, it kills you.
928.author: Katharine Hepburn

929.quote: If love is the answer, could you please rephrase the question?
929.author: Lily Tomlin

930.quote: If you want to be thought a liar, always tell the truth.
930.author: Logan Pearsall Smith

931.quote: How many people here have telekenetic powers? Raise my hand.
931.author: Emo Philips

933.quote: What contemptible scoundrel has stolen the cork to my lunch?
933.author: W. Clement Stone

934.quote: When I was a boy the Dead Sea was only sick.
934.author: George Burns

935.quote: Why don't you get out of that wet coat and into a dry martini?
935.author: Robert Benchley

936.quote: Work hard for what you want because it won't come to you without a fight. You have to be strong and courageous and know that you can do anything you put your mind to. If somebody puts you down or criticizes you, just keep on believing in yourself and turn it into something positive.
936.author: Leah LaBelle

937.quote: Find a place inside where there's joy, and the joy will burn out the pain.
937.author: Joseph Campbell

938.quote: In order to carry a positive action we must develop here a positive vision.
938.author: Dalai Lama

939.quote: Yesterday is not ours to recover, but tomorrow is ours to win or lose.
939.author: Lyndon B. Johnson

940.quote: Keep your face to the sunshine and you cannot see a shadow.
940.author: Helen Keller

941.quote: Positive anything is better than negative nothing.
941.author: Elbert Hubbard

942.quote: Correction does much, but encouragement does more.
942.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

943.quote: I truly believe that everything that we do and everyone that we meet is put in our path for a purpose. There are no accidents; we're all teachers - if we're willing to pay attention to the lessons we learn, trust our positive instincts and not be afraid to take risks or wait for some miracle to come knocking at our door.
943.author: Marla Gibbs

944.quote: Once you replace negative thoughts with positive ones, you'll start having positive results.
944.author: Willie Nelson

945.quote: No matter what you're going through, there's a light at the end of the tunnel and it may seem hard to get to it but you can do it and just keep working towards it and you'll find the positive side of things.
945.author: Demi Lovato

946.quote: Live life to the fullest, and focus on the positive.
946.author: Matt Cameron

947.quote: I often think that the night is more alive and more richly colored than the day.
947.author: Vincent Van Gogh

949.quote: Believe that life is worth living and your belief will help create the fact.
949.author: William James

950.quote: You've done it before and you can do it now. See the positive possibilities. Redirect the substantial energy of your frustration and turn it into positive, effective, unstoppable determination.
950.author: Ralph Marston

951.quote: Your smile will give you a positive countenance that will make people feel comfortable around you.
951.author: Les Brown

952.quote: To succeed, you need to find something to hold on to, something to motivate you, something to inspire you.
952.author: Tony Dorsett

953.quote: A strong, positive self-image is the best possible preparation for success.
953.author: Joyce Brothers

954.quote: Your attitude is like a box of crayons that color your world. Constantly color your picture gray, and your picture will always be bleak. Try adding some bright colors to the picture by including humor, and your picture begins to lighten up.
954.author: Allen Klein

955.quote: Did I offer peace today? Did I bring a smile to someone's face? Did I say words of healing? Did I let go of my anger and resentment? Did I forgive? Did I love? These are the real questions. I must trust that the little bit of love that I sow now will bear many fruits, here in this world and the life to come.
955.author: Henri Nouwen

956.quote: You cannot have a positive life and a negative mind.
956.author: Joyce Meyer

957.quote: I believe if you keep your faith, you keep your trust, you keep the right attitude, if you're grateful, you'll see God open up new doors.
957.author: Joel Osteen

958.quote: You are the sum total of everything you've ever seen, heard, eaten, smelled, been told, forgot - it's all there. Everything influences each of us, and because of that I try to make sure that my experiences are positive.
958.author: Maya Angelou

959.quote: Always Do Your Best. Your best is going to change from moment to moment; it will be different when you are healthy as opposed to sick. Under any circumstance, simply do your best, and you will avoid self-judgment, self-abuse and regret.
959.author: Don Miguel Ruiz

960.quote: The joy of life comes from our encounters with new experiences, and hence there is no greater joy than to have an endlessly changing horizon, for each day to have a new and different sun.
960.author: Christopher McCandless

961.quote: If you have a positive attitude and constantly strive to give your best effort, eventually you will overcome your immediate problems and find you are ready for greater challenges.
961.author: Pat Riley

962.quote: Positive feelings come from being honest about yourself and accepting your personality, and physical characteristics, warts and all; and, from belonging to a family that accepts you without question.
962.author: Willard Scott

963.quote: If you're not making mistakes, then you're not doing anything. I'm positive that a doer makes mistakes.
963.author: John Wooden

964.quote: You're going to go through tough times - that's life. But I say, 'Nothing happens to you, it happens for you.' See the positive in negative events.
964.author: Joel Osteen

965.quote: The most important thing is to try and inspire people so that they can be great in whatever they want to do.
965.author: Kobe Bryant

966.quote: I do believe we're all connected. I do believe in positive energy. I do believe in the power of prayer. I do believe in putting good out into the world. And I believe in taking care of each other.
966.author: Harvey Fierstein

967.quote: Trust in dreams, for in them is hidden the gate to eternity.
967.author: Khalil Gibran

968.quote: When you wake up every day, you have two choices. You can either be positive or negative; an optimist or a pessimist. I choose to be an optimist. It's all a matter of perspective.
968.author: Harvey Mackay

969.quote: You must not under any pretense allow your mind to dwell on any thought that is not positive, constructive, optimistic, kind.
969.author: Emmet Fox

970.quote: Pessimism leads to weakness, optimism to power.
970.author: William James

971.quote: It takes but one positive thought when given a chance to survive and thrive to overpower an entire army of negative thoughts.
971.author: Robert H. Schuller

972.quote: I like to encourage people to realize that any action is a good action if it's proactive and there is positive intent behind it.
972.author: Michael J. Fox

973.quote: Positive thinking will let you do everything better than negative thinking will.
973.author: Zig Ziglar

974.quote: Work hard, stay positive, and get up early. It's the best part of the day.
974.author: George Allen, Sr.

975.quote: Perpetual optimism is a force multiplier.
975.author: Colin Powell

976.quote: The gift of fantasy has meant more to me than my talent for absorbing positive knowledge.
976.author: Albert Einstein

977.quote: I was determined to share my positive approach and not let diabetes stand in the way of enjoying my life.
977.author: Paula Deen

978.quote: I think anything is possible if you have the mindset and the will and desire to do it and put the time in.
978.author: Roger Clemens

979.quote: Even when bad things happen you have to try to use those bad things in a positive manner and really just take the positive out of it.
979.author: Natalie du Toit

980.quote: It's a wonderful thing to be optimistic. It keeps you healthy and it keeps you resilient.
980.author: Daniel Kahneman

981.quote: I'm looking forward to influencing others in a positive way. My message is you can do anything if you just put your mind to it.
981.author: Justin Bieber

982.quote: The way positive reinforcement is carried out is more important than the amount.
982.author: B. F. Skinner

983.quote: Delete the negative; accentuate the positive!
983.author: Donna Karan

984.quote: There are powers inside of you which, if you could discover and use, would make of you everything you ever dreamed or imagined you could become.
984.author: Orison Swett Marden

985.quote: The learner always begins by finding fault, but the scholar sees the positive merit in everything.
985.author: Georg Wilhelm Friedrich Hegel

986.quote: Like success, failure is many things to many people. With Positive Mental Attitude, failure is a learning experience, a rung on the ladder, a plateau at which to get your thoughts in order and prepare to try again.
986.author: W. Clement Stone

987.quote: A mediocre idea that generates enthusiasm will go further than a great idea that inspires no one.
987.author: Mary Kay Ash

988.quote: You have to listen to the people who have a negative opinion as well as those who have positive opinion. Just to make sure that you are blending all these opinions in your mind before a decision is made.
988.author: Carlos Ghosn

989.quote: A year or so ago I went through all the people in my life and asked myself: does this person inspire me, genuinely love me and support me unconditionally? I wanted nothing but positive influences in my life.
989.author: Mena Suvari

990.quote: Satisfaction consists in freedom from pain, which is the positive element of life.
990.author: Arthur Schopenhauer

991.quote: Our chief want is someone who will inspire us to be what we know we could be.
991.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

992.quote: Every positive value has its price in negative terms... the genius of Einstein leads to Hiroshima.
992.author: Pablo Picasso

993.quote: I always like to look on the optimistic side of life, but I am realistic enough to know that life is a complex matter.
993.author: Walt Disney

994.quote: Talking is always positive. That's why I talk too much.
994.author: Louis C. K.

995.quote: Winners make a habit of manufacturing their own positive expectations in advance of the event.
995.author: Brian Tracy

996.quote: Say and do something positive that will help the situation; it doesn't take any brains to complain.
996.author: Robert A. Cook

997.quote: There is no advertisement as powerful as a positive reputation traveling fast.
997.author: Brian Koslow

998.quote: I believe that you should gravitate to people who are doing productive and positive things with their lives.
998.author: Nadia Comaneci

999.quote: My dear friend, clear your mind of cant.
999.author: Samuel Johnson

1000.quote: A lot of times people look at the negative side of what they feel they can't do. I always look on the positive side of what I can do.
1000.author: Chuck Norris

1001.quote: When someone does something good, applaud! You will make two people happy.
1001.author: Samuel Goldwyn

1002.quote: A positive attitude is something everyone can work on, and everyone can learn how to employ it.
1002.author: Joan Lunden

1003.quote: Look at people for an example, but then make sure to do things your way. Surround yourself with positive people.
1003.author: Queen Latifah

1004.quote: I'm totally into new age and self-help books. I used to work in a bookstore and that's the section they gave me, and I got way into it. I just loved the power of positive thinking, letting yourself go.
1004.author: Jason Mraz

1005.quote: When I learn something new - and it happens every day - I feel a little more at home in this universe, a little more comfortable in the nest.
1005.author: Bill Moyers

1006.quote: There is only one thing for us to do, and that is to do our level best right where we are every day of our lives; To use our best judgment, and then to trust the rest to that Power which holds the forces of the universe in his hands.
1006.author: Orison Swett Marden

1007.quote: Wondrous is the strength of cheerfulness, and its power of endurance - the cheerful man will do more in the same time, will do it; better, will preserve it longer, than the sad or sullen.
1007.author: Thomas Carlyle

1008.quote: If you are given a chance to be a role model, I think you should always take it because you can influence a person's life in a positive light, and that's what I want to do. That's what it's all about.
1008.author: Tiger Woods

1009.quote: I think a lot of times we don't pay enough attention to people with a positive attitude because we assume they are naive or stupid or unschooled.
1009.author: Amy Adams

1010.quote: I'm taking all the negatives in my life, and turning them into a positive.
1010.author: Pitbull

1011.quote: And I have to work so hard at talking positively to myself. If I don't, it's just real hard to get through the day, and I'll get really down, and just want to cry. My whole body language changes. I get more slumped over.
1011.author: Delta Burke

1012.quote: A good laugh is sunshine in the house.
1012.author: William Makepeace Thackeray

1013.quote: I feel that sin and evil are the negative part of you, and I think it's like a battery: you've got to have the negative and the positive in order to be a complete person.
1013.author: Dolly Parton

1014.quote: I don't want to waste anyone's time or money. I want to give people some truth and positive heart lift.
1014.author: Mos Def

1015.quote: Don't let people disrespect you. My mom says don't open the door to the devil. Surround yourself with positive people.
1015.author: Cuba Gooding, Jr.

1016.quote: The person who can bring the spirit of laughter into a room is indeed blessed.
1016.author: Bennett Cerf

1017.quote: Few things in the world are more powerful than a positive push. A smile. A world of optimism and hope. A 'you can do it' when things are tough.
1017.author: Richard M. DeVos

1018.quote: When you are enthusiastic about what you do, you feel this positive energy. It's very simple.
1018.author: Paulo Coelho

1019.quote: I've always believed that you can think positive just as well as you can think negative.
1019.author: James A. Baldwin

1020.quote: Positive thinking is more than just a tagline. It changes the way we behave. And I firmly believe that when I am positive, it not only makes me better, but it also makes those around me better.
1020.author: Harvey Mackay

1021.quote: My optimism wears heavy boots and is loud.
1021.author: Henry Rollins

1022.quote: Always turn a negative situation into a positive situation.
1022.author: Michael Jordan

1023.quote: I believe in karma, and I believe if you put out positive vibes to everybody, that's all you're going to get back.
1023.author: Kesha

1024.quote: Dream small dreams. If you make them too big, you get overwhelmed and you don't do anything. If you make small goals and accomplish them, it gives you the confidence to go on to higher goals.
1024.author: John H. Johnson

1025.quote: I believe in Karma. If the good is sown, the good is collected. When positive things are made, that returns well.
1025.author: Yannick Noah

1026.quote: As long as you as an individual... can convince yourself that in order to move forward as best you can you have to be optimistic, you can be described as 'one of the faithful,' one of those people who can say, 'Well, look, something's going to happen! Let's just keep trying. Let's not give up.
1026.author: Tom Hanks

1027.quote: Look up, laugh loud, talk big, keep the color in your cheek and the fire in your eye, adorn your person, maintain your health, your beauty and your animal spirits.
1027.author: William Hazlitt

1028.quote: You learn far more from negative leadership than from positive leadership. Because you learn how not to do it. And, therefore, you learn how to do it.
1028.author: Norman Schwarzkopf

1029.quote: It's your outlook on life that counts. If you take yourself lightly and don't take yourself too seriously, pretty soon you can find the humor in our everyday lives. And sometimes it can be a lifesaver.
1029.author: Betty White

1030.quote: I surround myself with positive, productive people of good will and decency.
1030.author: Ted Nugent

1031.quote: Your destiny is to fulfill those things upon which you focus most intently. So choose to keep your focus on that which is truly magnificent, beautiful, uplifting and joyful. Your life is always moving toward something.
1031.author: Ralph Marston

1032.quote: The best thing to do when you find yourself in a hurting or vulnerable place is to surround yourself with the strongest, finest, most positive people you know.
1032.author: Kristin Armstrong

1033.quote: Chaotic people often have chaotic lives, and I think they create that. But if you try and have an inner peace and a positive attitude, I think you attract that.
1033.author: Imelda Staunton

1034.quote: That's my gift. I let that negativity roll off me like water off a duck's back. If it's not positive, I didn't hear it. If you can overcome that, fights are easy.
1034.author: George Foreman

1035.quote: Today or any day that phone may ring and bring good news.
1035.author: Ethel Waters

1036.quote: People deal too much with the negative, with what is wrong. Why not try and see positive things, to just touch those things and make them bloom?
1036.author: Nhat Hanh

1037.quote: Miracles occur naturally as expressions of love. The real miracle is the love that inspires them. In this sense everything that comes from love is a miracle.
1037.author: Marianne Williamson

1038.quote: You can't make positive choices for the rest of your life without an environment that makes those choices easy, natural, and enjoyable.
1038.author: Deepak Chopra

1039.quote: But I have found that in the simple act of living with hope, and in the daily effort to have a positive impact in the world, the days I do have are made all the more meaningful and precious. And for that I am grateful.
1039.author: Elizabeth Edwards

1040.quote: When push comes to shove, it ain't the science that's going to lift you up - it's the belief, the spiritual side of life, that's going to lift you up, no matter what religion you are.
1040.author: Kirstie Alley

1041.quote: So long as you've got your friends about you, and a good positive attitude, you don't really have to care what everyone else thinks.
1041.author: Gail Porter

1042.quote: Some people never contribute anything positive to society, they may even drain our resources, but most of us try to do something better, to give back.
1042.author: Martin Yan

1043.quote: So there was a fire inside me. And that fire inside you, it can be turned into a negative form or a positive form. And I gradually realised that I had this fire and that it had to be used in a positive way.
1043.author: John Newcombe

1044.quote: Where men of judgment creep and feel their way, The positive pronounce without dismay.
1044.author: William Cowper

1045.quote: Instead of hating, I have chosen to forgive and spend all of my positive energy on changing the world.
1045.author: Camryn Manheim

1046.quote: I am not embarrassed to tell you that I believe in miracles.
1046.author: Corazon Aquino

1047.quote: Excellence encourages one about life generally; it shows the spiritual wealth of the world.
1047.author: George Eliot

1048.quote: The most positive men are the most credulous.
1048.author: Alexander Pope

1049.quote: If it's great stuff, the people who consume it are nourished. It's a positive force.
1049.author: Manuel Puig

1050.quote: I am fascinated by what is beautiful, strong, healthy, what is living. I seek harmony.
1050.author: Leni Riefenstahl

1051.quote: I really struggle with that feeling of helplessness. That's why I really try to get my blogs, and even myself, to point to the positive and look at all the inspiring things that are happening.
1051.author: Daryl Hannah

1052.quote: Sometimes the most positive thing you can be in a boring society is absolutely negative.
1052.author: John Lydon

1053.quote: There is a sense that things, if you keep positive and optimistic about what can be done, do work out.
1053.author: Hillary Clinton

1054.quote: I was blessed with certain gifts and talents and God gave them to me to be the best person I can be and to have a positive impact on other people.
1054.author: Bryan Clay

1055.quote: Having achieved my own dreams, I want to give to kids who are less fortunate, who struggle with everyday obstacles. I want to give them something positive in their lives: support.
1055.author: Kristi Yamaguchi

1056.quote: My purpose: to lift your spirit and to motivate you.
1056.author: Mavis Staples

1057.quote: Fortune cookies are a good idea. If the message is positive, it can make your day a little better.
1057.author: Yao Ming

1058.quote: Perhaps one of the only positive pieces of advice that I was ever given was that supplied by an old courtier who observed: Only two rules really count. Never miss an opportunity to relieve yourself; never miss a chance to sit down and rest your feet.
1058.author: Edward VIII

1059.quote: You shall always find what you created in your mind, for instance, a benevolent God or an evil Devil. Between them are countless facets. Therefore, concentrate on the depth of your consciousness and on what you consider to be positive and good.
1059.author: Hans Bender

1060.quote: A President cannot always be popular.
1060.author: Harry S Truman

1061.quote: First of all, I try to be a positive role model.
1061.author: Caitlyn Jenner

1062.quote: I hope to make a positive, productive contribution, as cheesy as that may sound.
1062.author: Chelsea Clinton

1063.quote: God never ends anything on a negative; God always ends on a positive.
1063.author: Edwin Louis Cole

1064.quote: You have to enjoy life. Always be surrounded by people that you like, people who have a nice conversation. There are so many positive things to think about.
1064.author: Sophia Loren

1065.quote: A positive attitude causes a chain reaction of positive thoughts, events and outcomes. It is a catalyst and it sparks extraordinary results.
1065.author: Wade Boggs

1066.quote: Successful people maintain a positive focus in life no matter what is going on around them. They stay focused on their past successes rather than their past failures, and on the next action steps they need to take to get them closer to the fulfillment of their goals rather than all the other distractions that life presents to them.
1066.author: Jack Canfield

1067.quote: Choosing to be positive and having a grateful attitude is going to determine how you're going to live your life.
1067.author: Joel Osteen

1068.quote: In every day, there are 1,440 minutes. That means we have 1,440 daily opportunities to make a positive impact.
1068.author: Les Brown

1069.quote: In times of great stress or adversity, it's always best to keep busy, to plow your anger and your energy into something positive.
1069.author: Lee Iacocca

1070.quote: Love yourself. It is important to stay positive because beauty comes from the inside out.
1070.author: Jenn Proske

1071.quote: I think it's important to get your surroundings as well as yourself into a positive state - meaning surround yourself with positive people, not the kind who are negative and jealous of everything you do.
1071.author: Heidi Klum

1072.quote: I truly believe in positive synergy, that your positive mindset gives you a more hopeful outlook, and belief that you can do something great means you will do something great.
1072.author: Russell Wilson

1073.quote: At the end of the day, the most overwhelming key to a child's success is the positive involvement of parents.
1073.author: Jane D. Hull

1074.quote: Resist your fear; fear will never lead to you a positive end. Go for your faith and what you believe.
1074.author: T. D. Jakes

1075.quote: Success or failure depends more upon attitude than upon capacity successful men act as though they have accomplished or are enjoying something. Soon it becomes a reality. Act, look, feel successful, conduct yourself accordingly, and you will be amazed at the positive results.
1075.author: William James

1076.quote: European nations began World War I with a glamorous vision of war, only to be psychologically shattered by the realities of the trenches. The experience changed the way people referred to the glamour of battle; they treated it no longer as a positive quality but as a dangerous illusion.
1076.author: Virginia Postrel

1077.quote: Social media websites are no longer performing an envisaged function of creating a positive communication link among friends, family and professionals. It is a veritable battleground, where insults fly from the human quiver, damaging lives, destroying self-esteem and a person's sense of self-worth.
1077.author: Anthony Carmona

1078.quote: Your positive action combined with positive thinking results in success.
1078.author: Shiv Khera

1079.quote: If I write a book where all I've ever experienced is success, people won't take a positive lesson from it. In being candid, I have to own up to my own failures, both in my marriage and in my work environment.
1079.author: Sonia Sotomayor

1080.quote: I work so hard to make that sure I'm successful. If you're positive and really excited and enthusiastic about what you're doing, it's going to happen, and it's going to happen big time.
1080.author: Shawn Mendes

1081.quote: Life is short, youth is finite, and opportunities endless. Have you found the intersection of your passion and the potential for world-shaping positive impact? If you don't have a great idea of your own, there are plenty of great teams that need you - unknown startups and established teams in giant companies alike.
1081.author: Justin Rosenstein

1082.quote: You can't live a positive life with a negative mind and if you have a positive outcome you have a positive income and just to have more positivity and just to kind of laugh it off.
1082.author: Miley Cyrus

1083.quote: While you're going through this process of trying to find the satisfaction in your work, pretend you feel satisfied. Tell yourself you had a good day. Walk through the corridors with a smile rather than a scowl. Your positive energy will radiate. If you act like you're having fun, you'll find you are having fun.
1083.author: Jean Chatzky

1084.quote: Having the positive belief that it will all be O.K. just means that you hustle and make it work because failure is not even an option in your own mind.
1084.author: Natalie Massenet

1085.quote: When you show deep empathy toward others, their defensive energy goes down, and positive energy replaces it. That's when you can get more creative in solving problems.
1085.author: Stephen Covey

1086.quote: I will keep smiling, be positive and never give up! I will give 100 percent each time I play. These are always my goals and my attitude.
1086.author: Yani Tseng

1087.quote: We can bring positive energy into our daily lives by smiling more, talking to strangers in line, replacing handshakes with hugs, and calling our friends just to tell them we love them.
1087.author: Brandon Jenner

1088.quote: Museums are managers of consciousness. They give us an interpretation of history, of how to view the world and locate ourselves in it. They are, if you want to put it in positive terms, great educational institutions. If you want to put it in negative terms, they are propaganda machines.
1088.author: Hans Haacke

1089.quote: It's all positive energy from me, man.
1089.author: Swizz Beatz

1090.quote: The internet could be a very positive step towards education, organisation and participation in a meaningful society.
1090.author: Noam Chomsky

1091.quote: I love meeting people, and I know it's so difficult for people to come up to me and introduce themselves, so when they do, I'll grab them and hug them. It makes their day, you know? I love that, and I get positive energy from that.
1091.author: Nicola Formichetti

1092.quote: I've realized the extraordinary power of sports to heal, unite and inspire. I believe the Olympics will serve as the ultimate platform to provide positive changes and I hope to inspire all of Japan through my strong showing there.
1092.author: Kohei Uchimura

1093.quote: I don't think of myself as a role model for others, but I like to live my life by my own integrity. So, in that sense, I might be a positive influence. I do believe you should get over your insecurities and just try to be the best you can.
1093.author: Lily Cole

1094.quote: I am positive that I would see the end of child labour around the world in my lifetime, as the poorest of the poor have realised that education is a tool that can empower them.
1094.author: Kailash Satyarthi

1095.quote: Financial institutions, the corporate world and civil society - all must uphold high standards of probity in their working. Only a genuine partnership between the Government and its people can bring about positive change to create a just society.
1095.author: Pratibha Patil

1096.quote: I tend to regard the Coase theorem as a stepping stone on the way to an analysis of an economy with positive transaction costs.
1096.author: Ronald Coase

1097.quote: I just believe in the goodwill of people, the power of people to do something positive.
1097.author: Eddie Izzard

1098.quote: I surf more now for other people than myself. I feel a lot of support from people wanting me to do well, and I feed off that. I can send a positive message to people from what I do.
1098.author: Kelly Slater

1099.quote: I have my team. Like if you see everyone around me - I have my hair and makeup girl, my assistant. They're very calm, they're all about positive energy. There're no drama queens. Everyone wants everyone else to have a positive experience. There are no agendas. I think it creates a healthy environment and there are no boundaries to cross.
1099.author: Fergie

1100.quote: Negative attitude is nine times more powerful than positive attitude.
1100.author: Bikram Choudhury

1101.quote: I believe one of the best things about managing people is that we can influence lives in a positive way. That's basically what a manager is about. When I can do that, I am very happy.
1101.author: Arsene Wenger

1102.quote: Directing a movie is a little bit like being back in student government and putting on the homecoming dance. You're like, 'You put up the streamers, and you hire the DJ, and you get the punch bowl.' Some people are just like, 'This dance sucks.' And you're like, 'No no, this dance is awesome!' You have to be really positive.
1102.author: Mike Birbiglia

1103.quote: You can do everything you can to try to stop bad things from happening to you, but eventually things will happen, so the best prevention is a positive attitude.
1103.author: Marie Osmond

1104.quote: I hope the millions of people I've touched have the optimism and desire to share their goals and hard work and persevere with a positive attitude.
1104.author: Michael Jordan

1105.quote: Reggae has a philosophy, you know? It's not just entertainment. There's an idea behind it, a way of life behind the music, which is a positive way of life, which is a progressive way of life for better people.
1105.author: Ziggy Marley

1106.quote: Commitment, belief and positive attitude are all important if you're going to be a success, whether you're in sports, in business or, as in my case, anthropology.
1106.author: Donald Johanson

1107.quote: I've always been motivated more by negative comments than by positive ones. I know what I do well. Tell me what I don't do well.
1107.author: Abby Wambach

1108.quote: I am not a big fan of positive thinking. The term suggests that there is something negative that you have to counteract by being positive. That is an artificial duality.
1108.author: Srikumar Rao

1109.quote: It's important to think good, speak good, and do good. If we want to see positive change in the world, then we need to connect to goodness. I try in everything I do, both in business and philanthropy, to make a positive change and do that by doing good.
1109.author: Shari Arison

1110.quote: I think the best advice came from Drew Barrymore, about always finding love in everything you do and keeping a positive attitude and being thankful.
1110.author: Bella Thorne

1111.quote: It's actually cool to be positive and optimistic and idealistic. It's cool to see yourself doing beautiful, great things.
1111.author: Tom DeLonge

1112.quote: Christians were instructed to serve others, and the thanksgiving was for the grace of God and the fact that God offered a way for man to return to a positive relationship with Him.
1112.author: John Clayton

1113.quote: Well, you know, a lot of people look at the negative things, the things that they did wrong and - which I do. But I like to stress on the things I did right, because there are certain things that I like to look at from a positive standpoint that are just positive reinforcement.
1113.author: Tiger Woods

1114.quote: Nearly all inventions are not recognised for their positive side either when they're made. So, for example, scientists didn't go out to design a CD machine: they designed a laser. But we got all sorts of things from a laser which we never remotely imagined, and we're still finding things for a laser to do.
1114.author: Robert Winston

1115.quote: When a person listens to a good song, and they can look out at the world and their lives and see the dark and the light, the negative and the positive, all the different elements, all come together in one holistic poem, that is a very healing and very reductive thing, and that's what my music is about.
1115.author: Matisyahu

1116.quote: Take your mind off the problems for a moment, and focus on the positive possibilities. Consider how very much you are able to do.
1116.author: Ralph Marston

1117.quote: We should be the pro-legal immigration party. A party that has a positive platform and agenda on how we can create a legal immigration system that works for immigrants and works for America.
1117.author: Marco Rubio

1118.quote: Positive social emotions like compassion and empathy are generally good for us, and we want to encourage them. But do we know how to most reliably raise children to care about the suffering of other people? I'm not sure we do.
1118.author: Sam Harris

1119.quote: I have a very positive attitude in life. My insecurity, fear and need to know about tomorrow has fortunately eased. What is going to happen will happen anyway. So why break my head over it?
1119.author: Katrina Kaif

1120.quote: When I was working at the Sprint store, I got laid off. I was bummed out, but I stayed positive. I used the money I had earned while working there to make my first album. Without that job, maybe 'Corazon Sin Cara' would never had been made. It's a very inspirational story.
1120.author: Prince Royce

1121.quote: It's a positive thing to talk about terrible things and make people laugh about them.
1121.author: Louis C. K.

1122.quote: Resilience isn't a single skill. It's a variety of skills and coping mechanisms. To bounce back from bumps in the road as well as failures, you should focus on emphasizing the positive.
1122.author: Jean Chatzky

1123.quote: For to be poised against fatality, to meet adverse conditions gracefully, is more than simple endurance; it is an act of aggression, a positive triumph.
1123.author: Thomas Mann

1124.quote: Sometimes, reading my own media, the negativity can upset me, but I just deal with things on a positive basis. I mean, I have up to 20,000 people singing my words back to me on a nightly basis - they share my hopes and fears, and they relate to my own life experiences. Life can be pretty isolating, but that connection is always amazing.
1124.author: James Blunt

1125.quote: Confidence isn't optimism or pessimism, and it's not a character attribute. It's the expectation of a positive outcome.
1125.author: Rosabeth Moss Kanter

1126.quote: I realize I will always be the poster child for police brutality, but I can try to use that as a positive force for healing and restraint.
1126.author: Rodney King

1127.quote: As a tennis player, you have to get used to losing every week. Unless you win the tournament, you always go home as a loser. But you have to take the positive out of a defeat and go back to work. Improve to fail better.
1127.author: Stanislas Wawrinka

1128.quote: I have played on many teams throughout my career, and I know when a team has the tools, and the right positive attitude towards winning.
1128.author: Boomer Esiason

1129.quote: The most important thing is to stay positive.
1129.author: Saku Koivu

1130.quote: You have a lot of ups and downs in coaching, especially, but I can't remember any bad times at this point. I mean, they're all good. A lot of tears when you lose, a lot of down times, but I can't remember any of them. They're all positive now. Even the bad times were good.
1130.author: Don Nelson

1131.quote: Adopting the right attitude can convert a negative stress into a positive one.
1131.author: Hans Selye

1132.quote: You can have meaning, accomplishment, engagement and good relationships, even if you are dull on the positive affect side.
1132.author: Martin Seligman

1133.quote: Living with anyone for many years takes skill. To keep peace in the household, couples learn to adapt to one another, hopefully in positive ways.
1133.author: Diane Ackerman

1134.quote: We must not constantly talk about tackling obesity and warning people about the negative consequences of obesity. Instead we must be positive - positive about the fun and benefits to be had from healthy living, trying to get rid of people's excuses for being obese by tackling the issue in a positive way.
1134.author: Andrew Lansley

1135.quote: People shouldn't look at me and think life is one big piece of glamour. That's the marketing, the spin. Life is challenging. But I have courage, strength, and enough good health to see the positive.
1135.author: Carmen Dell'Orefice

1136.quote: Having a positive mental attitude is asking how something can be done rather than saying it can't be done.
1136.author: Bo Bennett

1137.quote: Listening is a positive act: you have to put yourself out to do it.
1137.author: David Hockney

1138.quote: But you see, our society is still trapped in this binary, black/white logic and that has had some very positive implications for our generation. It's had some very negative ones as well and one of the negative ones is that it creates enormous identity problems for people who have one black ancestor and all white ancestors for example.
1138.author: Henry Louis Gates

1139.quote: I love baseball. The game allowed me the influence to impact kids in a positive way. This gives me a chance to talk to some social issues.
1139.author: Cal Ripken, Jr.

1140.quote: Either positive or negative comments are good because it shows I am still relevant.
1140.author: Justin Guarini

1141.quote: I miss driving to Goodison Park. I miss just the positive energy of the fans walking into the stadium and how much they care about that club and the team. And I miss the players a lot.
1141.author: Landon Donovan

1142.quote: I was very pleased that the positive things about me and my game outshone the aggressive style of play I use. I would never tone that down, because I believe in that style of play, and I believe that you can play rough on the court and still be a good sport.
1142.author: Sue Wicks

1143.quote: To have the chance to see your music be elevated and to have almost universally positive response to that music, makes me feel better every day. I feel more confident and inspired, and that's fun.
1143.author: John Legend

1144.quote: In our music, in our everyday life, there are so many negative things. Why not have something positive and stamp it with blackness?
1144.author: Jamie Foxx

1145.quote: I always figure from the cradle to the grave, we all have our individual journeys, and maybe my journey was a positive one and I accomplished certain things without stepping on too many toes.
1145.author: Robert Duvall

1146.quote: Perhaps trying to move away from my problems and focus on the positive is the best I can do.
1146.author: Jenni Rivera

1147.quote: True health infuses positive energy in the mind, body and spirit; it is a main focus in my life.
1147.author: Maximillian Degenerez

1148.quote: Optimists are usually wrong. But all the great change in history, positive change, was done by optimists.
1148.author: Thomas Friedman

1149.quote: My ultimate aim is to make euthanasia a positive experience.
1149.author: Jack Kevorkian

1150.quote: The British system had requirements, including Latin. I'm not positive you ever had to know Greek, but there are certainly kinds of curricula where you had to know Greek too. I think in Britain there was the most mindless, repetitive sort of learning.
1150.author: William Scott

1151.quote: Positive health means becoming whole-heartedly engaged with our own health care. It means not outsourcing our health to the health care system. It means getting rid of the fear and paralysis we too often feel, and instead cultivating a sense of agency.
1151.author: Jane McGonigal

1152.quote: Facing the press is not easy, but because you have to go, you have to try to take a lot of positive things for yourself from these face-to-face meetings.
1152.author: Jose Mourinho

1153.quote: It feels bad when a film doesn't work; everyone puts in a lot of effort to make a movie. The positive side to failure - they make me work harder.
1153.author: Shahid Kapoor

1154.quote: 'Do What You Gotta Do' is a positive, inspirational song that says no matter what it is; whether you're up against challenges or trying to get your dreams and aspirations met, you should do what whatever you have to do shy of killing yourself or someone else.
1154.author: Angie Stone

1155.quote: Instead of yelling and spanking, which don't work anyway, I believe in finding creative ways to keep their attention - turning things into a game, for instance. And, when they do something good, positive reinforcement and praise.
1155.author: Patricia Richardson

1156.quote: Good is positive. Evil is merely privative, not absolute: it is like cold, which is the privation of heat. All evil is so much death or nonentity. Benevolence is absolute and real. So much benevolence as a man hath, so much life hath he.
1156.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

1157.quote: I know that I came into the world with what I call 'big dharma' - with a blueprint to teach self-reliance and a positive loving approach to large numbers of people all over the globe. I am ever so grateful for the circumstances of my life that allowed me to be pretty much left alone and to develop as I was so intended in this incarnation.
1157.author: Wayne Dyer

1158.quote: Decades of research have shown that most happy families communicate effectively. But talking doesn't mean simply 'talking through problems,' as important as that is. Talking also means telling a positive story about yourselves.
1158.author: Bruce Feiler

1159.quote: All personality traits have their good side and their bad side. But for a long time, we've seen introversion only through its negative side and extroversion mostly through its positive side.
1159.author: Susan Cain

1160.quote: I think a fight with David Haye, even if he is not American, is going to give positive vibes about the heavyweight division for the American fans and fans worldwide.
1160.author: Wladimir Klitschko

1161.quote: It can literally change someone's life; it's very positive for young teenagers to get into cosplay if they do it with their friends or with supervision from their parents - it can really foster their social skills.
1161.author: Yaya Han

1162.quote: Adopting a really positive attitude can work wonders to adding years to your life, a spring to your step, a sparkle to your eye, and all of that.
1162.author: Christie Brinkley

1163.quote: In my work in Haiti, I've seen the hugely positive effects that happen when people come together to build something in the middle of the most desperate situations.
1163.author: Olivia Wilde

1164.quote: I am positive - determined to move forward with my life, bring up my babies, and do the best job I can as a mother, entertainer, and person.
1164.author: Jennifer Lopez

1165.quote: We must not fail to recognise that television can be a hugely positive influence in children's lives, one of the greatest educators in contemporary society and an increasing influence on all the children followed in 'Child of Our Time.'
1165.author: Robert Winston

1166.quote: I'm a big cockeyed optimist. I try to accentuate the positive as opposed to the negative.
1166.author: Betty White

1167.quote: Every person gets negative things, they learn from those negative things, and you become a positive person.
1167.author: Kapil Dev

1168.quote: If you embrace 'positive thinking,' you are - by definition - spurning 'negative thinking.' So it's as if you were on a teeter-totter and are trying desperately to put all your weight on one side - the 'positive thinking' side.
1168.author: Srikumar Rao

1169.quote: I'm confident that the commitment of the co-chairs of the Ferguson Commission - along with the work of other local leaders and the Missouri General Assembly - will have a very positive impact as this community works to move forward.
1169.author: Roy Blunt

1170.quote: A flower cannot blossom without sunshine, and man cannot live without love.
1170.author: Max Muller

1171.quote: Love is when the other person's happiness is more important than your own.
1171.author: H. Jackson Brown, Jr.

1172.quote: Immature love says: 'I love you because I need you.' Mature love says 'I need you because I love you.'
1172.author: Erich Fromm

1173.quote: You can't blame gravity for falling in love.
1173.author: Albert Einstein

1174.quote: Let us always meet each other with smile, for the smile is the beginning of love.
1174.author: Mother Teresa

1175.quote: Keep love in your heart. A life without it is like a sunless garden when the flowers are dead.
1175.author: Oscar Wilde

1176.quote: Love isn't something you find. Love is something that finds you.
1176.author: Loretta Young

1177.quote: Love is friendship that has caught fire. It is quiet understanding, mutual confidence, sharing and forgiving. It is loyalty through good and bad times. It settles for less than perfection and makes allowances for human weaknesses.
1177.author: Ann Landers

1178.quote: Sometimes the heart sees what is invisible to the eye.
1178.author: H. Jackson Brown, Jr.

1179.quote: Spread love everywhere you go. Let no one ever come to you without leaving happier.
1179.author: Mother Teresa

1180.quote: Kindness in words creates confidence. Kindness in thinking creates profoundness. Kindness in giving creates love.
1180.author: Lao Tzu

1181.quote: True love is like ghosts, which everyone talks about and few have seen.
1181.author: Francois de La Rochefoucauld

1182.quote: Being deeply loved by someone gives you strength, while loving someone deeply gives you courage.
1182.author: Lao Tzu

1183.quote: The best thing to hold onto in life is each other.
1183.author: Audrey Hepburn

1184.quote: I have found the paradox, that if you love until it hurts, there can be no more hurt, only more love.
1184.author: Mother Teresa

1185.quote: You can search throughout the entire universe for someone who is more deserving of your love and affection than you are yourself, and that person is not to be found anywhere. You yourself, as much as anybody in the entire universe deserve your love and affection.
1185.author: Buddha

1186.quote: Love is a smoke made with the fume of sighs.
1186.author: William Shakespeare

1187.quote: A new command I give you: Love one another. As I have loved you, so you must love one another.
1187.author: Jesus Christ

1188.quote: There is no surprise more magical than the surprise of being loved: It is God's finger on man's shoulder.
1188.author: Charles Morgan
