2342.author: Chris Hadfield

2343.quote: I am not afraid of an army of lions led by a sheep; I am afraid of an army of sheep led by a lion.
2343.author: Alexander the Great

2344.quote: Management is doing things right; leadership is doing the right things.
2344.author: Peter Drucker

2345.quote: The quality of a leader is reflected in the standards they set for themselves.
2345.author: Ray Kroc

2346.quote: If the highest aim of a captain were to preserve his ship, he would keep it in port forever.
2346.author: Thomas Aquinas

2347.quote: A good leader takes a little more than his share of the blame, a little less than his share of the credit.
2347.author: Arnold H. Glasow

2348.quote: Innovation distinguishes between a leader and a follower.
2348.author: Steve Jobs

2349.quote: You have to think anyway, so why not think big?
2349.author: Donald Trump

2350.quote: Be a yardstick of quality. Some people aren't used to an environment where excellence is expected.
2350.author: Steve Jobs

2351.quote: Leadership and learning are indispensable to each other.
2351.author: John F. Kennedy

2352.quote: When you can't make them see the light, make them feel the heat.
2352.author: Ronald Reagan

2353.quote: A leader is best when people barely know he exists, when his work is done, his aim fulfilled, they will say: we did it ourselves.
2353.author: Lao Tzu

2354.quote: A genuine leader is not a searcher for consensus but a molder of consensus.
2354.author: Martin Luther King, Jr.

2355.quote: Leadership is solving problems. The day soldiers stop bringing you their problems is the day you have stopped leading them. They have either lost confidence that you can help or concluded you do not care. Either case is a failure of leadership.
2355.author: Colin Powell

2356.quote: Only the guy who isn't rowing has time to rock the boat.
2356.author: Jean-Paul Sartre

2357.quote: A leader is a dealer in hope.
2357.author: Napoleon Bonaparte

2358.quote: If you think you can do a thing or think you can't do a thing, you're right.
2358.author: Henry Ford

2359.quote: It is better to lead from behind and to put others in front, especially when you celebrate victory when nice things occur. You take the front line when there is danger. Then people will appreciate your leadership.
2359.author: Nelson Mandela

2360.quote: Speak softly and carry a big stick; you will go far.
2360.author: Theodore Roosevelt

2361.quote: Don't find fault, find a remedy.
2361.author: Henry Ford

2362.quote: Enlightened leadership is spiritual if we understand spirituality not as some kind of religious dogma or ideology but as the domain of awareness where we experience values like truth, goodness, beauty, love and compassion, and also intuition, creativity, insight and focused attention.
2362.author: Deepak Chopra

2363.quote: Effective leadership is putting first things first. Effective management is discipline, carrying it out.
2363.author: Stephen Covey

2364.quote: Outstanding leaders go out of their way to boost the self-esteem of their personnel. If people believe in themselves, it's amazing what they can accomplish.
2364.author: Sam Walton

2365.quote: Where there is no vision, there is no hope.
2365.author: George Washington Carver

2366.quote: High expectations are the key to everything.
2366.author: Sam Walton

2367.quote: Leadership is the capacity to translate vision into reality.
2367.author: Warren Bennis

2368.quote: Hold yourself responsible for a higher standard than anybody expects of you. Never excuse yourself.
2368.author: Henry Ward Beecher

2369.quote: Leadership is the art of getting someone else to do something you want done because he wants to do it.
2369.author: Dwight D. Eisenhower

2370.quote: Leadership can not be measured in a poll or even in the result of an election. It can only be truly seen with the benefit of time. From the perspective of 20 years, not 20 days.
2370.author: Marco Rubio

2371.quote: Problems are only opportunities in work clothes.
2371.author: Henry J. Kaiser

2372.quote: Good management is the art of making problems so interesting and their solutions so constructive that everyone wants to get to work and deal with them.
2372.author: Paul Hawken

2373.quote: Leadership is unlocking people's potential to become better.
2373.author: Bill Bradley

2374.quote: When your values are clear to you, making decisions becomes easier.
2374.author: Roy E. Disney

2375.quote: Getting in touch with your true self must be your first priority.
2375.author: Tom Hopkins

2376.quote: A man who wants to lead the orchestra must turn his back on the crowd.
2376.author: Max Lucado

2377.quote: Effective leadership is not about making speeches or being liked; leadership is defined by results not attributes.
2377.author: Peter Drucker

2378.quote: Without initiative, leaders are simply workers in leadership positions.
2378.author: Bo Bennett

2379.quote: Go as far as you can see; when you get there, you'll be able to see farther.
2379.author: J. P. Morgan

2380.quote: Leaders must be close enough to relate to others, but far enough ahead to motivate them.
2380.author: John C. Maxwell

2381.quote: Obstacles are things a person sees when he takes his eyes off his goal.
2381.author: E. Joseph Cossman

2382.quote: Give whatever you are doing and whoever you are with the gift of your attention.
2382.author: Jim Rohn

2383.quote: If you care enough for a result, you will most certainly attain it.
2383.author: William James

2384.quote: A leader who doesn't hesitate before he sends his nation into battle is not fit to be a leader.
2384.author: Golda Meir

2385.quote: Leadership cannot really be taught. It can only be learned.
2385.author: Harold S. Geneen

2386.quote: Leadership is practiced not so much in words as in attitude and in actions.
2386.author: Harold S. Geneen

2387.quote: People ask the difference between a leader and a boss. The leader leads, and the boss drives.
2387.author: Theodore Roosevelt

2388.quote: To succeed, one must be creative and persistent.
2388.author: John H. Johnson

2391.quote: Leadership - leadership is about taking responsibility, not making excuses.
2391.author: Mitt Romney

2392.quote: To succeed in business it is necessary to make others see things as you see them.
2392.author: Aristotle Onassis

2393.quote: Today a reader, tomorrow a leader.
2393.author: Margaret Fuller

2394.quote: Leadership consists of picking good men and helping them do their best.
2394.author: Chester W. Nimitz

2395.quote: Affirmation without discipline is the beginning of delusion.
2395.author: Jim Rohn

2396.quote: Management is about arranging and telling. Leadership is about nurturing and enhancing.
2396.author: Tom Peters

2397.quote: Leadership does not depend on being right.
2397.author: Ivan Illich

2398.quote: How we think shows through in how we act. Attitudes are mirrors of the mind. They reflect thinking.
2398.author: David Joseph Schwartz

2399.quote: Leadership to me means duty, honor, country. It means character, and it means listening from time to time.
2399.author: George W. Bush

2400.quote: No man will make a great leader who wants to do it all himself or get all the credit for doing it.
2400.author: Andrew Carnegie

2401.quote: One must be convinced to convince, to have enthusiasm to stimulate the others.
2401.author: Stefan Zweig

2402.quote: Doing is a quantum leap from imagining.
2402.author: Barbara Sher

2403.quote: If you have ideas, you have the main asset you need, and there isn't any limit to what you can do with your business and your life. Ideas are any man's greatest asset.
2403.author: Harvey S. Firestone

2404.quote: I am a general. My soldiers are the keys and I have to command them.
2404.author: Vladimir Horowitz

2406.quote: My attitude is never to be satisfied, never enough, never.
2406.author: Duke Ellington

2408.quote: Honor bespeaks worth. Confidence begets trust. Service brings satisfaction. Cooperation proves the quality of leadership.
2408.author: James Cash Penney

2409.quote: It is better to have a lion at the head of an army of sheep, than a sheep at the head of an army of lions.
2409.author: Daniel Defoe

2410.quote: Good leadership consists of showing average people how to do the work of superior people.
2410.author: John D. Rockefeller

2411.quote: Everyone who's ever taken a shower has an idea. It's the person who gets out of the shower, dries off and does something about it who makes a difference.
2411.author: Nolan Bushnell

2412.quote: The great leaders have always stage-managed their effects.
2412.author: Charles de Gaulle

2414.quote: The art of leadership is saying no, not saying yes. It is very easy to say yes.
2414.author: Tony Blair

2415.quote: You have to lead people gently toward what they already know is right.
2415.author: Phil Crosby

2417.quote: I suppose leadership at one time meant muscles; but today it means getting along with people.
2417.author: Mahatma Gandhi

2418.quote: Be the chief but never the lord.
2418.author: Lao Tzu

2419.quote: If a window of opportunity appears, don't pull down the shade.
2419.author: Tom Peters

2420.quote: The speed of the leader is the speed of the gang.
2420.author: Mary Kay Ash

2421.quote: Leadership is diving for a loose ball, getting the crowd involved, getting other players involved. It's being able to take it as well as dish it out. That's the only way you're going to get respect from the players.
2421.author: Larry Bird

2422.quote: The amount of good luck coming your way depends on your willingness to act.
2422.author: Barbara Sher

2423.quote: He who is prudent and lies in wait for an enemy who is not, will be victorious.
2423.author: Sun Tzu

2424.quote: If you want a quality, act as if you already had it.
2424.author: William James

2425.quote: Time is neutral and does not change things. With courage and initiative, leaders change things.
2425.author: Jesse Jackson

2426.quote: When placed in command, take charge.
2426.author: Norman Schwarzkopf

2427.quote: A leader does not deserve the name unless he is willing occasionally to stand alone.
2427.author: Henry A. Kissinger

2428.quote: The task of the leader is to get his people from where they are to where they have not been.
2428.author: Henry A. Kissinger

2429.quote: Millions saw the apple fall, but Newton was the one who asked why.
2429.author: Bernard Baruch

2430.quote: Think little goals and expect little achievements. Think big goals and win big success.
2430.author: David Joseph Schwartz

2431.quote: People who enjoy meetings should not be in charge of anything.
2431.author: Thomas Sowell

2432.quote: It is essential to employ, trust, and reward those whose perspective, ability, and judgment are radically different from yours. It is also rare, for it requires uncommon humility, tolerance, and wisdom.
2432.author: Dee Hock

2433.quote: No matter how carefully you plan your goals they will never be more than pipe dreams unless you pursue them with gusto.
2433.author: W. Clement Stone

2434.quote: The exercise of power is determined by thousands of interactions between the world of the powerful and that of the powerless, all the more so because these worlds are never divided by a sharp line: everyone has a small part of himself in both.
2434.author: Vaclav Havel

2435.quote: It is rare to find a business partner who is selfless. If you are lucky it happens once in a lifetime.
2435.author: Michael Eisner

2436.quote: When the best leader's work is done the people say, 'We did it ourselves.'
2436.author: Lao Tzu

2437.quote: Making good decisions is a crucial skill at every level.
2437.author: Peter Drucker

2438.quote: I look for what needs to be done. After all, that's how the universe designs itself.
2438.author: R. Buckminster Fuller

2439.quote: Be careful the environment you choose for it will shape you; be careful the friends you choose for you will become like them.
2439.author: W. Clement Stone

2440.quote: Great companies in the way they work, start with great leaders.
2440.author: Steve Ballmer

2441.quote: A throne is only a bench covered with velvet.
2441.author: Napoleon Bonaparte

2442.quote: There are three secrets to managing. The first secret is have patience. The second is be patient. And the third most important secret is patience.
2442.author: Chuck Tanner

2443.quote: The key to being a good manager is keeping the people who hate me away from those who are still undecided.
2443.author: Casey Stengel

2444.quote: People buy into the leader before they buy into the vision.
2444.author: John C. Maxwell

2445.quote: I'm not a natural leader. I'm too intellectual; I'm too abstract; I think too much.
2445.author: Newt Gingrich

2446.quote: The employer generally gets the employees he deserves.
2446.author: J. Paul Getty

2447.quote: The first man gets the oyster, the second man gets the shell.
2447.author: Andrew Carnegie

2448.quote: I have always supported measures and principles and not men.
2448.author: Davy Crockett

2449.quote: The very exercise of leadership fosters capacity for it.
2449.author: Cyril Falls

2450.quote: If you command wisely, you'll be obeyed cheerfully.
2450.author: Thomas Fuller

2451.quote: Lead, follow, or get out of the way.
2451.author: Laurence J. Peter

2452.quote: Every act of conscious learning requires the willingness to suffer an injury to one's self-esteem. That is why young children, before they are aware of their own self-importance, learn so easily.
2452.author: Thomas Szasz

2453.quote: I don't know any other way to lead but by example.
2453.author: Don Shula

2454.quote: Our business in life is not to get ahead of others, but to get ahead of ourselves.
2454.author: E. Joseph Cossman

2455.quote: A man always has two reasons for doing anything: a good reason and the real reason.
2455.author: J. P. Morgan

2457.quote: You have to have your heart in the business and the business in your heart.
2457.author: An Wang

2458.quote: Leaders have to act more quickly today. The pressure comes much faster.
2458.author: Andy Grove

2459.quote: It is, after all, the responsibility of the expert to operate the familiar and that of the leader to transcend it.
2459.author: Henry A. Kissinger

2460.quote: Get the best people and train them well.
2460.author: Scott McNealy

2461.quote: Leaders must encourage their organizations to dance to forms of music yet to be heard.
2461.author: Warren Bennis

2462.quote: The nicest thing about standards is that there are so many of them to choose from.
2462.author: Ken Olsen

2463.quote: In fair weather prepare for foul.
2463.author: Thomas Fuller

2464.quote: The real leader has no need to lead - he is content to point the way.
2464.author: Henry Miller

2465.quote: No wind serves him who addresses his voyage to no certain port.
2465.author: Michel de Montaigne

2467.quote: You're only as good as the people you hire.
2467.author: Ray Kroc

2468.quote: If you want to get the most out of your men, give them a break! Don't make them work completely in the dark. If you do, they won't do a bit more than they have to. But if they comprehend, they'll work like mad.
2468.author: Chesty Puller

2469.quote: You have no power at all if you do not exercise constant power.
2469.author: Major Owens

2470.quote: The supreme quality for leadership is unquestionably integrity. Without it, no real success is possible, no matter whether it is on a section gang, a football field, in an army, or in an office.
2470.author: Dwight D. Eisenhower

2471.quote: Leadership is not about the next election, it's about the next generation.
2471.author: Simon Sinek

2472.quote: The secret to success is good leadership, and good leadership is all about making the lives of your team members or workers better.
2472.author: Tony Dungy

2473.quote: You don't lead by hitting people over the head - that's assault, not leadership.
2473.author: Dwight D. Eisenhower

2474.quote: Management is efficiency in climbing the ladder of success; leadership determines whether the ladder is leaning against the right wall.
2474.author: Stephen Covey

2475.quote: I think the currency of leadership is transparency. You've got to be truthful. I don't think you should be vulnerable every day, but there are moments where you've got to share your soul and conscience with people and show them who you are, and not be afraid of it.
2475.author: Howard Schultz

2476.quote: If you don't understand that you work for your mislabeled 'subordinates', then you know nothing of leadership. You know only tyranny.
2476.author: Dee Hock

2477.quote: In order to cultivate a set of leaders with legitimacy in the eyes of the citizenry, it is necessary that the path to leadership be visibly open to talented and qualified individuals of every race and ethnicity.
2477.author: Sandra Day O'Connor

2478.quote: Leadership is not about a title or a designation. It's about impact, influence and inspiration. Impact involves getting results, influence is about spreading the passion you have for your work, and you have to inspire team-mates and customers.
2478.author: Robin S. Sharma

2479.quote: There is no greater name for a leader than mother or father. There is no leadership more important than parenthood.
2479.author: Sheri L. Dew

2480.quote: The cardinal responsibility of leadership is to identify the dominant contradiction at each point of the historical process and to work out a central line to resolve it.
2480.author: Mao Zedong

2481.quote: Divorced from ethics, leadership is reduced to management and politics to mere technique.
2481.author: James MacGregor Burns

2482.quote: Most leadership strategies are doomed to failure from the outset. As people have been noting for years, the majority of strategic initiatives that are driven from the top are marginally effective - at best.
2482.author: Peter Senge

2483.quote: One of the lessons of leadership worth emphasizing is that you want to get to know other great leaders and take their advice. At some point in your development, it's only people who've been in the seat of having to be leaders who can help you in a deep way.
2483.author: Jim Yong Kim

2484.quote: I think leadership is not something you learn; it's something you discover.
2484.author: Myles Munroe

2485.quote: Republican leadership in Congress let the energy companies write the energy bill that sent prices soaring, and has turned a blind eye to the struggles of working families trying to make ends meet.
2485.author: Sherrod Brown

2486.quote: I don't want to over generalize, but I believe that women are typically drawn to leadership styles that focus on consensus building, effective listening and working in teams. That's certainly been my leadership style, and I think it's been very successful.
2486.author: Margaret Hamburg

2487.quote: Educationists should build the capacities of the spirit of inquiry, creativity, entrepreneurial and moral leadership among students and become their role model.
2487.author: A. P. J. Abdul Kalam

2488.quote: We must recognize that as the dominant power in the world we have a special responsibility. In addition to protecting our national interests, we must take the leadership in protecting the common interests of humanity.
2488.author: George Soros

2489.quote: Leadership is something you earn, something you're chosen for. You can't come in yelling, 'I'm your leader!' If it happens, it's because the other guys respect you.
2489.author: Ben Roethlisberger

2490.quote: Vocational education programs have made a real difference in the lives of countless young people nationwide; they build self-confidence and leadership skills by allowing students to utilize their unique gifts and talents.
2490.author: Conrad Burns

2491.quote: There are good leaders who actively guide and bad leaders who actively misguide. Hence, leadership is about persuasion, presentation and people skills.
2491.author: Shiv Khera

2492.quote: The biggest difference is in the leadership. It was better for us. We had more coaches and mentors to help us. A lot of the younger players today suffer from a lack of direction.
2492.author: Isaiah Thomas

2493.quote: Leaders of the future will have to be visionary and be able to bring people in - real communicators. These are things that women bring to leadership and executive positions, and it's going to be incredibly valuable and incredibly in demand.
2493.author: Anita Borg

2494.quote: I think it is quite dangerous for an organisation to think they can predict where they are going to need leadership. It needs to be something that people are willing to assume if it feels relevant, given the context of any situation.
2494.author: Margaret J. Wheatley

2495.quote: Pay attention to those employees who respectfully ask why. They are demonstrating an interest in their jobs and exhibiting a curiosity that could eventually translate into leadership ability.
2495.author: Harvey Mackay

2496.quote: A good cult delivers on its promises. A good cult nourishes the needs of its members, has transparency and integrity, and creates provisions for challenging its leadership openly. A good cult expands the freedoms and well-being of its members rather than limits them.
2496.author: Philip Zimbardo

2497.quote: Leadership is getting someone to do what they don't want to do, to achieve what they want to achieve.
2497.author: Tom Landry

2498.quote: Uncertainty is a permanent part of the leadership landscape. It never goes away.
2498.author: Andy Stanley

2499.quote: Power should be reserved for weightlifting and boats, and leadership really involves responsibility.
2499.author: Herb Kelleher

2500.quote: For success of any mission, it is necessary to have creative leadership. Creative leadership is vital for government, non-governmental organisations as well as for industries.
2500.author: A. P. J. Abdul Kalam

2501.quote: One of the tests of leadership is the ability to recognize a problem before it becomes an emergency.
2501.author: Arnold H. Glasow

2502.quote: Leadership is a matter of having people look at you and gain confidence, seeing how you react. If you're in control, they're in control.
2502.author: Tom Landry

2503.quote: Not everybody is created equal, and it's important for companies to identify those high potentials and treat them differently, accelerate their development and pay them more. That process is so incredibly important to developing first-class leadership in a company.
2503.author: Anne M. Mulcahy

2504.quote: I think for me, or for anyone who plays the quarterback position, it's almost an unspoken word when you think about leadership. Some guys can be a leader and be a running back or a lineman, or wide receiver, strong safety, or linebacker. But when you speak of quarterbacks, it's automatically a default that you're supposed to be a leader.
2504.author: Cam Newton

2505.quote: We need leadership that can elevate religion and morality to their position of paramount importance and thus eliminate growing selfishness, immorality and materialism.
2505.author: George W. Romney

2506.quote: Well, I think that - I think leadership's always been about two main things: imagination and courage.
2506.author: Paul Keating

2507.quote: Leadership is an intense journey into yourself. You can use your own style to get anything done. It's about being self-aware. Every morning, I look in the mirror and say, 'I could have done three things better yesterday.'
2507.author: Jeffrey R. Immelt

2508.quote: The 9/11 Commission recently released their report, citing important changes which need to be made to improve our nation's homeland security. I voiced my disappointment with the House leadership when this report was left until after the August recess for action.
2508.author: Leonard Boswell

2509.quote: The very essence of leadership is that you have to have vision. You can't blow an uncertain trumpet.
2509.author: Theodore Hesburgh

2510.quote: A leadership culture is one where everyone thinks like an owner, a CEO or a managing director. It's one where everyone is entrepreneurial and proactive.
2510.author: Robin S. Sharma

2511.quote: Servant leadership is the foundation and the secret of Sam Walton's ability to achieve team synergy.
2511.author: Michael Bergdahl

2512.quote: Public office is supposed to be a public trust. This is a clear sign of the rampant corruption at the highest levels of the Republican leadership.
2512.author: Bob Etheridge

2513.quote: Leadership is an act of submission to God. To be a leader means listening to all kinds of people and situations. Out of that listening, we are hoping to discern the mind of God as best we can. This is the price of leadership - it's an act of sacrifice. So leadership is part and parcel of the work of submission to God.
2513.author: Richard Foster

2514.quote: Globalisation means many other countries are asserting themselves and trying to take over leadership. Please don't ask Americans to let others assume the leadership of human exploration. We can do wonderful science on the Moon, and wonderful commercial things. Then we can pack up and move on to Mars.
2514.author: Buzz Aldrin

2515.quote: In addition to removing our democratically elected government, Israel wants to sow dissent among Palestinians by claiming that there is a serious leadership rivalry among us. I am compelled to dispel this notion definitively.
2515.author: Ismail Haniyeh

2516.quote: By giving the leadership to the private sector in a capitalistic society, we're going to measure the value of art by how many products we can sell.
2516.author: Robert Wilson

2517.quote: It's a different era. Our job now is to show leadership and vision and to help the next generation of artists.
2517.author: Karen Kain

2518.quote: The test of leadership is not to put greatness into humanity, but to elicit it, for the greatness is already there.
2518.author: James Buchanan

2519.quote: Men make history and not the other way around. In periods where there is no leadership, society stands still. Progress occurs when courageous, skillful leaders seize the opportunity to change things for the better.
2519.author: Harry S Truman

2520.quote: I know of no single formula for success. But over the years I have observed that some attributes of leadership are universal and are often about finding ways of encouraging people to combine their efforts, their talents, their insights, their enthusiasm and their inspiration to work together.
2520.author: Queen Elizabeth II

2521.quote: The signs of outstanding leadership appear primarily among the followers. Are the followers reaching their potential? Are they learning? Serving? Do they achieve the required results? Do they change with grace? Manage conflict?
2521.author: Max de Pree

2522.quote: I think to be a great quarterback, you have to have a great leadership, great attention to detail, and a relentless competitive nature. And that's what I try to bring to the table, and I have a long way to go. I'm still learning, and I'm still on a constant quest for knowledge.
2522.author: Russell Wilson

2523.quote: Leadership is working with goals and vision; management is working with objectives.
2523.author: Russel Honore

2524.quote: Beginning under the Roman Empire, intellectual leadership in the West had been provided by Christianity. In the middle ages, who invented the first universities - in Paris, Oxford, Cambridge? The church.
2524.author: Nancy Pearcey

2525.quote: My height doesn't define my skill set. To be a great quarterback, you have to have great leadership, great attention to detail and a relentless competitive nature - and I try to bring that on a daily basis.
2525.author: Russell Wilson

2526.quote: God will never direct us to be prideful, arrogant and unforgiving, immoral or slothful or full of fear. We step into these things because we are insensitive to the leadership of the Holy Spirit within us.
2526.author: Charles Stanley

2527.quote: The function of leadership is to produce more leaders, not more followers.
2527.author: Ralph Nader

2528.quote: Anytime you're going to take your Marines into harm's way, they are looking for leadership that is calm, assertive, sure of themselves. And quite honestly, I don't think that some of these young Marines care if it's a male or a female. They just want to be properly led.
2528.author: Loretta Reynolds

2529.quote: As I've progressed in my career, I've come to appreciate - and really value - the other attributes that define a company's success beyond the P&L: great leadership, long-term financial strength, ethical business practices, evolving business strategies, sound governance, powerful brands, values-based decision-making.
2529.author: Ursula Burns

2530.quote: In a world of complex threats, our security and leadership depends on all elements of our power - including strong and principled diplomacy.
2530.author: Barack Obama

2531.quote: I vividly remember a conversation I had many years ago in 1974, which marked a turning point in my leadership journey. I was sitting at a Holiday Inn with my friend, Kurt Campmeyer, when he asked me if I had a personal growth plan. I didn't. In fact, I didn't even know you were supposed to have one.
2531.author: John C. Maxwell

2532.quote: A good objective of leadership is to help those who are doing poorly to do well and to help those who are doing well to do even better.
2532.author: Jim Rohn

2533.quote: Many corporate leaders and employees have the right intentions, but it can be overwhelming when you consider how everything is affected from leadership styles, to organizational structure, to employee engagement, to customer service an marketplace.
2533.author: Simon Mainwaring

2534.quote: No institution can possibly survive if it needs geniuses or supermen to manage it. It must be organized in such a way as to be able to get along under a leadership composed of average human beings.
2534.author: Peter Drucker

2535.quote: Leadership is not a popularity contest; it's about leaving your ego at the door. The name of the game is to lead without a title.
2535.author: Robin S. Sharma

2536.quote: All of the great leaders have had one characteristic in common: it was the willingness to confront unequivocally the major anxiety of their people in their time. This, and not much else, is the essence of leadership.
2536.author: John Kenneth Galbraith

2537.quote: President Bush has shown great leadership. He has said that the 21st century will not be ruled or dictated by terrorists, dictators, and murderers. He is absolutely right. God bless him for his resolve.
2537.author: Lindsey Graham

2538.quote: Sitting at a candidate rally is similar to sitting in a ballyard. Both give you the opportunity to assess the technical metrics and reflect on the intangibles - what baseball calls 'make up' and politics calls 'character' - the leadership, talent and maturity to add value to a venture.
2538.author: Christine Pelosi

2539.quote: If I were not African, I wonder whether it would be clear to me that Africa is a place where the people do not need limp gifts of fish but sturdy fishing rods and fair access to the pond. I wonder whether I would realize that while African nations have a failure of leadership, they also have dynamic people with agency and voices.
2539.author: Chimamanda Ngozi Adichie

2540.quote: Leadership consists not in degrees of technique but in traits of character; it requires moral rather than athletic or intellectual effort, and it imposes on both leader and follower alike the burdens of self-restraint.
2540.author: Lewis H. Lapham

2541.quote: We live in a society obsessed with public opinion. But leadership has never been about popularity.
2541.author: Marco Rubio

2542.quote: You learn far more from negative leadership than from positive leadership. Because you learn how not to do it. And, therefore, you learn how to do it.
2542.author: Norman Schwarzkopf

2543.quote: Leadership is about doing the right thing, even if it going against a vast number of naysayers and mediocre people.
2543.author: N. R. Narayana Murthy

2544.quote: Leadership is getting players to believe in you. If you tell a teammate you're ready to play as tough as you're able to, you'd better go out there and do it. Players will see right through a phony. And they can tell when you're not giving it all you've got.
2544.author: Larry Bird

2545.quote: Leadership requires the courage to make decisions that will benefit the next generation.
2545.author: Alan Autry

2546.quote: Humility is a great quality of leadership which derives respect and not just fear or hatred.
2546.author: Yousef Munayyer

2547.quote: Most businesses think that product is the most important thing, but without great leadership, mission and a team that deliver results at a high level, even the best product won't make a company successful.
2547.author: Robert Kiyosaki

2548.quote: Leadership is about being a servant first.
2548.author: Allen West

2549.quote: Leadership can't be fabricated. If it is fabricated and rehearsed, you can't fool the guys in the locker room. So when you talk about leadership, it comes with performance. Leadership comes with consistency.
2549.author: Junior Seau

2550.quote: My father's values and vision of this country obviously form everything I have as values and ideals. But this is not the ghost of my father running for the leadership of the Liberal party. This is me.
2550.author: Justin Trudeau

2551.quote: I'd like to see where boys and girls end up if they get equal encouragement - I think we might have some differences in how leadership is done.
2551.author: Sheryl Sandberg

2552.quote: Inspirational leaders need to have a winning mentality in order to inspire respect. It is hard to trust in the leadership of someone who is half-hearted about their purpose, or only sporadic in focus or enthusiasm.
2552.author: Sebastian Coe

2553.quote: I think leadership is most effective when it's your own personality. But I feel like it's a natural progression as a quarterback, as well.
2553.author: Andrew Luck

2554.quote: I hope telling the story of how I went from being a single mom to serving in the Texas State Senate to running for governor will remind others that with the right leadership in government, where you start has nothing to do with how far you go.
2554.author: Wendy Davis

2555.quote: Character in leadership is the most important balance for leadership. Without character, leaders have no safety. Leadership has no protection without character.
2555.author: Myles Munroe

2556.quote: To have long term success as a coach or in any position of leadership, you have to be obsessed in some way.
2556.author: Pat Riley

2557.quote: Leadership is a privilege to better the lives of others. It is not an opportunity to satisfy personal greed.
2557.author: Mwai Kibaki

2558.quote: The secret to understanding me is, I'm not trying to be anybody other than who I actually am. People want candid, refreshing leadership. And I've always tried to go with solutions. You know, I've always tried to say, here's how we get our economy growing, here's why we get our debt under control. That's what Mitt Romney is offering.
2558.author: Paul Ryan

2559.quote: I am the wealthiest man, not just in Europe, but in the whole world. I collect emotions. I am wealthy in that the people of Russia have twice entrusted me with the leadership of a great nation such as Russia - I believe that is my greatest wealth.
2559.author: Vladimir Putin

2560.quote: The topic of leadership is a touchy one. A lot of leaders fail because they don't have the bravery to touch that nerve or strike that chord. Throughout my years, I haven't had that fear.
2560.author: Kobe Bryant

2561.quote: No matter how good you think you are as a leader, my goodness, the people around you will have all kinds of ideas for how you can get better. So for me, the most fundamental thing about leadership is to have the humility to continue to get feedback and to try to get better - because your job is to try to help everybody else get better.
2561.author: Jim Yong Kim

2562.quote: But the person who scored well on an SAT will not necessarily be the best doctor or the best lawyer or the best businessman. These tests do not measure character, leadership, creativity, perseverance.
2562.author: William Julius Wilson

2563.quote: Leadership is intangible, and therefore no weapon ever designed can replace it.
2563.author: Omar N. Bradley

2564.quote: In giving us children, God places us in a position of both leadership and service. He calls us to give up our lives for someone else's sake - to abandon our own desires and put our child's interests first. Yet, according to His perfect design, it is through this selflessness that we can become truly fulfilled.
2564.author: Charles Stanley

2565.quote: I think leadership is knowing what you want to achieve and then purposefully and sensibly taking steps to achieve it, remembering always that you have got to bring people with you if you are seeking to be a successful political leader.
2565.author: Tony Abbott

2566.quote: Sport fosters many things that are good; teamwork and leadership.
2566.author: Daley Thompson

2567.quote: True leadership lies in guiding others to success. In ensuring that everyone is performing at their best, doing the work they are pledged to do and doing it well.
2567.author: Bill Owens

2568.quote: At the heart of great leadership is a curious mind, heart, and spirit.
2568.author: Chip Conley

2569.quote: We have treated our most serious adversaries, such as Iran and North Korea, in the most juvenile manner - by giving them the silent treatment. In so doing, we have weakened, not strengthened, our bargaining position and our leadership.
2569.author: Theodore C. Sorensen

2570.quote: The task of leadership is not to put greatness into humanity, but to elicit it, for the greatness is already there.
2570.author: John Buchan

2571.quote: You have to enable and empower people to make decisions independent of you. As I've learned, each person on a team is an extension of your leadership; if they feel empowered by you they will magnify your power to lead.
2571.author: Tom Ridge

2572.quote: I think America is in trouble, but it's not beyond repair. But it's going to take leadership who sees the greatness of this country and who believes that, once again, we can be one nation under God.
2572.author: Mike Huckabee

2573.quote: Leadership is a potent combination of strategy and character. But if you must be without one, be without the strategy.
2573.author: Norman Schwarzkopf

2574.quote: I am as bad as the worst, but, thank God, I am as good as the best.
2574.author: Walt Whitman

2575.quote: I'm selfish, impatient, and a little insecure. I make mistakes, I'm out of control, and at times hard to handle. But if you can't handle me at my worst, then you sure as hell don't deserve me at my best.
2575.author: Marilyn Monroe

2576.quote: The best way to find yourself is to lose yourself in the service of others.
2576.author: Mahatma Gandhi

2577.quote: The best way to predict the future is to create it.
2577.author: Peter Drucker

2578.quote: A problem is a chance for you to do your best.
2578.author: Duke Ellington

2579.quote: Do right. Do your best. Treat others as you want to be treated.
2579.author: Lou Holtz

2580.quote: The best way to cheer yourself up is to try to cheer somebody else up.
2580.author: Mark Twain

2581.quote: The best way to find out if you can trust somebody is to trust them.
2581.author: Ernest Hemingway

2582.quote: The best revenge is to be unlike him who performed the injury.
2582.author: Marcus Aurelius

2583.quote: In any moment of decision, the best thing you can do is the right thing, the next best thing is the wrong thing, and the worst thing you can do is nothing.
2583.author: Theodore Roosevelt

2584.quote: Learn to say 'no' to the good so you can say 'yes' to the best.
2584.author: John C. Maxwell

2585.quote: Whether it's the best of times or the worst of times, it's the only time we've got.
2585.author: Art Buchwald

2586.quote: We are at our very best, and we are happiest, when we are fully engaged in work we enjoy on the journey toward the goal we've established for ourselves. It gives meaning to our time off and comfort to our sleep. It makes everything else in life so wonderful, so worthwhile.
2586.author: Earl Nightingale

2587.quote: Do the best you can, and don't take life too serious.
2587.author: Will Rogers

2588.quote: At his best, man is the noblest of all animals; separated from law and justice he is the worst.
2588.author: Aristotle

2589.quote: Things turn out best for the people who make the best of the way things turn out.
2589.author: John Wooden

2590.quote: I never had a policy; I have just tried to do my very best each and every day.
2590.author: Abraham Lincoln

2591.quote: Nobody who ever gave his best regretted it.
2591.author: George Halas

2592.quote: It's a funny thing about life; if you refuse to accept anything but the best, you very often get it.
2592.author: W. Somerset Maugham

2593.quote: The best way of removing negativity is to laugh and be joyous.
2593.author: David Icke

2594.quote: You have to accept whatever comes and the only important thing is that you meet it with courage and with the best that you have to give.
2594.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

2595.quote: Living well is the best revenge.
2595.author: George Herbert

2596.quote: To be nobody but yourself in a world which is doing its best, night and day, to make you everybody else means to fight the hardest battle which any human being can fight; and never stop fighting.
2596.author: e. e. cummings

2597.quote: Knowing your own darkness is the best method for dealing with the darknesses of other people.
2597.author: Carl Jung

2598.quote: The best road to progress is freedom's road.
2598.author: John F. Kennedy

2599.quote: In the practice of tolerance, one's enemy is the best teacher.
2599.author: Dalai Lama

2600.quote: I always prefer to believe the best of everybody, it saves so much trouble.
2600.author: Rudyard Kipling

2601.quote: Do what you love to do and give it your very best. Whether it's business or baseball, or the theater, or any field. If you don't love what you're doing and you can't give it your best, get out of it. Life is too short. You'll be an old man before you know it.
2601.author: Al Lopez

2602.quote: The best revenge is massive success.
2602.author: Frank Sinatra

2603.quote: To give anything less than your best, is to sacrifice the gift.
2603.author: Steve Prefontaine

2604.quote: The best luck of all is the luck you make for yourself.
2604.author: Douglas MacArthur

2605.quote: I have the simplest tastes. I am always satisfied with the best.
2605.author: Oscar Wilde

2607.quote: The things we know best are the things we haven't been taught.
2607.author: Luc de Clapiers

2608.quote: Look for your choices, pick the best one, then go with it.
2608.author: Pat Riley

2609.quote: Just do the best you can. No one can do more than that.
2609.author: John Wooden

2610.quote: But men are men; the best sometimes forget.
2610.author: William Shakespeare

2611.quote: The best mirror is an old friend.
2611.author: Peter Nivio Zarlenga

2612.quote: When things are bad, it's the best time to reinvent yourself.
2612.author: George Lopez

2613.quote: The best ideas come as jokes. Make your thinking as funny as possible.
2613.author: David Ogilvy

2614.quote: To give and then not feel that one has given is the very best of all ways of giving.
2614.author: Max Beerbohm

2615.quote: The only real failure in life is not to be true to the best one knows.
2615.author: Buddha

2616.quote: If a man does his best, what else is there?
2616.author: George S. Patton

2617.quote: Expect the best. Prepare for the worst. Capitalize on what comes.
2617.author: Zig Ziglar

2618.quote: That best portion of a man's life, his little, nameless, unremembered acts of kindness and love.
2618.author: William Wordsworth

2619.quote: Look your best - who said love is blind?
2619.author: Mae West

2620.quote: The best thing about the future is that it comes only one day at a time.
2620.author: Dean Acheson

2621.quote: If you want to go somewhere, it is best to find someone who has already been there.
2621.author: Robert Kiyosaki

2622.quote: The best work is not what is most difficult for you; it is what you do best.
2622.author: Jean-Paul Sartre

2623.quote: This is the precept by which I have lived: Prepare for the worst; expect the best; and take what comes.
2623.author: Hannah Arendt

2624.quote: The best is the enemy of the good.
2624.author: Voltaire

2625.quote: At its best, life is completely unpredictable.
2625.author: Christopher Walken

2626.quote: I am the best in baseball.
2626.author: Reggie Jackson

2627.quote: Since we live in this world, we have to do our best for this world.
2627.author: Aung San Suu Kyi

2628.quote: There are some things you learn best in calm, and some in storm.
2628.author: Willa Cather

2630.quote: It was the best of times, it was the worst of times.
2630.author: Charles Dickens

2631.quote: Our best thoughts come from others.
2631.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

2632.quote: Everybody's got a job to do, and I do mine as best I can.
2632.author: Marlee Matlin

2633.quote: The creed of a true saint is to make the best of life, and to make the most of it.
2633.author: Edwin Hubbel Chapin

2634.quote: The best revenge is to live on and prove yourself.
2634.author: Eddie Vedder

2635.quote: To love and win is the best thing. To love and lose, the next best.
2635.author: William Makepeace Thackeray

2636.quote: I believe that a simple and unassuming manner of life is best for everyone, best both for the body and the mind.
2636.author: Albert Einstein

2637.quote: I do the very best I know how - the very best I can; and I mean to keep on doing so until the end.
2637.author: Abraham Lincoln

2638.quote: The worst thing that happens to you may be the best thing for you if you don't let it get the best of you.
2638.author: Will Rogers

2639.quote: The best cure for the body is a quiet mind.
2639.author: Napoleon Bonaparte

2640.quote: The worst men often give the best advice.
2640.author: Francis Bacon

2641.quote: The best doctors in the world are Doctor Diet, Doctor Quiet, and Doctor Merryman.
2641.author: Jonathan Swift

2642.quote: He who knows best knows how little he knows.
2642.author: Thomas Jefferson

2643.quote: Why don't you start believing that no matter what you have or haven't done, that your best days are still out in front of you.
2643.author: Joel Osteen

2644.quote: Life doesn't require that we be the best, only that we try our best.
2644.author: H. Jackson Brown, Jr.

2645.quote: I have made the choices that work best for me. I know I cannot please everyone, and that's fine.
2645.author: Marlee Matlin

2646.quote: Grow old with me! The best is yet to be.
2646.author: Robert Browning

2647.quote: The best preparation for tomorrow is to do today's work superbly well.
2647.author: William Osler

2648.quote: The days you work are the best days.
2648.author: Georgia O'Keeffe

2650.quote: I did my best, and God did the rest.
2650.author: Hattie McDaniel

2651.quote: A person always doing his or her best becomes a natural leader, just by example.
2651.author: Joe DiMaggio

2652.quote: Enthusiasm is the best protection in any situation. Wholeheartedness is contagious. Give yourself, if you wish to get others.
2652.author: David Seabury

2653.quote: I have found the best way to give advice to your children is to find out what they want and then advise them to do it.
2653.author: Harry S Truman

2654.quote: The most basic question is not what is best, but who shall decide what is best.
2654.author: Thomas Sowell

2655.quote: I am easily satisfied with the very best.
2655.author: Winston Churchill

2656.quote: A woman knows by intuition, or instinct, what is best for herself.
2656.author: Marilyn Monroe

2657.quote: The best way to resolve any problem in the human world is for all sides to sit down and talk.
2657.author: Dalai Lama

2658.quote: I will do my best. That is all I can do. I ask for your help - and God's.
2658.author: Lyndon B. Johnson

2659.quote: The best intelligence test is what we do with our leisure.
2659.author: Laurence J. Peter

2660.quote: I may be as bad as the worst, but, thank God, I am as good as the best.
2660.author: Walt Whitman

2661.quote: Life is best when you are in love.
2661.author: Michael Moriarty

2662.quote: The best books... are those that tell you what you know already.
2662.author: George Orwell

2663.quote: When we do the best that we can, we never know what miracle is wrought in our life, or in the life of another.
2663.author: Helen Keller

2664.quote: First gain the victory and then make the best use of it you can.
2664.author: Horatio Nelson

2665.quote: The best way to hold a man is in your arms.
2665.author: Mae West

2666.quote: There is only one real sin and that is to persuade oneself that the second best is anything but second best.
2666.author: Doris Lessing

2667.quote: You get the best out of others when you get the best out of yourself.
2667.author: Harvey S. Firestone

2668.quote: That's your best friend and your worst enemy - your own brain.
2668.author: Fred Durst

2669.quote: Next to acquiring good friends, the best acquisition is that of good books.
2669.author: Charles Caleb Colton

2670.quote: The best person to get something done is a busy person.
2670.author: Mark Burnett

2671.quote: Find out what you like doing best and get someone to pay you for it.
2671.author: Katharine Whitehorn

2672.quote: Most of the things we decide are not what we know to be the best. We say yes, merely because we are driven into a corner and must say something.
2672.author: Frank Crane

2673.quote: The best way to keep one's word is not to give it.
2673.author: Napoleon Bonaparte

2674.quote: But I always think that the best way to know God is to love many things.
2674.author: Vincent Van Gogh

2675.quote: The best things in life are silly.
2675.author: Scott Adams

2676.quote: Clever men are good, but they are not the best.
2676.author: Thomas Carlyle

2677.quote: When you do not know what you are doing and what you are doing is the best - that is inspiration.
2677.author: Robert Bresson

2678.quote: Just do what you do best.
2678.author: Red Auerbach

2679.quote: Culture is the habit of being pleased with the best and knowing why.
2679.author: Henry Van Dyke

2680.quote: The best thing to do with the best things in life is to give them up.
2680.author: Ambrose Bierce

2681.quote: You'll live. Only the best get killed.
2681.author: Charles de Gaulle

2682.quote: The best thing about animals is that they don't talk much.
2682.author: Thornton Wilder

2683.quote: One of the best things to do sometimes is simply to be.
2683.author: Eric Butterworth

2684.quote: The man who has done his best has done everything.
2684.author: Charles M. Schwab

2685.quote: The best time for you to hold your tongue is the time you feel you must say something or bust.
2685.author: Josh Billings

2686.quote: It is best for the wise man not to seem wise.
2686.author: Aeschylus

2687.quote: Usually, the stuff that's your best idea or work is going to be attacked the most.
2687.author: Francis Ford Coppola

2688.quote: The best way to navigate through life is to give up all of our controls.
2688.author: Gerald Jampolsky

2689.quote: The best preparation for tomorrow is doing your best today.
2689.author: H. Jackson Brown, Jr.

2690.quote: The best and most beautiful things in the world cannot be seen or even touched - they must be felt with the heart.
2690.author: Helen Keller

2691.quote: Good, better, best. Never let it rest. 'Til your good is better and your better is best.
2691.author: St. Jerome

2692.quote: Always do your best. What you plant now, you will harvest later.
2692.author: Og Mandino

2693.quote: The price of success is hard work, dedication to the job at hand, and the determination that whether we win or lose, we have applied the best of ourselves to the task at hand.
2693.author: Vince Lombardi

2694.quote: The best way to pay for a lovely moment is to enjoy it.
2694.author: Richard Bach

2695.quote: Ultimately, leadership is not about glorious crowning acts. It's about keeping your team focused on a goal and motivated to do their best to achieve it, especially when the stakes are high and the consequences really matter. It is about laying the groundwork for others' success, and then standing back and letting them shine.
2695.author: Chris Hadfield

2696.quote: The best thing to hold onto in life is each other.
2696.author: Audrey Hepburn

2697.quote: Health is the greatest gift, contentment the greatest wealth, faithfulness the best relationship.
2697.author: Buddha

2698.quote: My best friend is the one who brings out the best in me.
2698.author: Henry Ford

2699.quote: An investment in knowledge pays the best interest.
2699.author: Benjamin Franklin

2700.quote: Look at the sky. We are not alone. The whole universe is friendly to us and conspires only to give the best to those who dream and work.
2700.author: A. P. J. Abdul Kalam

2701.quote: A strong, positive self-image is the best possible preparation for success.
2701.author: Joyce Brothers

2702.quote: No one wants to die. Even people who want to go to heaven don't want to die to get there. And yet death is the destination we all share. No one has ever escaped it. And that is as it should be, because Death is very likely the single best invention of Life. It is Life's change agent. It clears out the old to make way for the new.
2702.author: Steve Jobs

2703.quote: My life motto is 'Do my best, so that I can't blame myself for anything.'
2703.author: Magdalena Neuner

2704.quote: My dream is of a place and a time where America will once again be seen as the last best hope of earth.
2704.author: Abraham Lincoln

2705.quote: The best preparation for good work tomorrow is to do good work today.
2705.author: Elbert Hubbard

2706.quote: I believe in pink. I believe that laughing is the best calorie burner. I believe in kissing, kissing a lot. I believe in being strong when everything seems to be going wrong. I believe that happy girls are the prettiest girls. I believe that tomorrow is another day and I believe in miracles.
2706.author: Audrey Hepburn

2707.quote: To help yourself, you must be yourself. Be the best that you can be. When you make a mistake, learn from it, pick yourself up and move on.
2707.author: Dave Pelzer

2708.quote: It is no use saying, 'We are doing our best.' You have got to succeed in doing what is necessary.
2708.author: Winston Churchill

2709.quote: A leader is best when people barely know he exists, when his work is done, his aim fulfilled, they will say: we did it ourselves.
2709.author: Lao Tzu

2710.quote: Always Do Your Best. Your best is going to change from moment to moment; it will be different when you are healthy as opposed to sick. Under any circumstance, simply do your best, and you will avoid self-judgment, self-abuse and regret.
2710.author: Don Miguel Ruiz

2711.quote: The best thing one can do when it's raining is to let it rain.
2711.author: Henry Wadsworth Longfellow

2712.quote: The boundaries which divide Life from Death are at best shadowy and vague. Who shall say where the one ends, and where the other begins?
2712.author: Edgar Allan Poe

2713.quote: If you have a positive attitude and constantly strive to give your best effort, eventually you will overcome your immediate problems and find you are ready for greater challenges.
2713.author: Pat Riley

2714.quote: We must develop and maintain the capacity to forgive. He who is devoid of the power to forgive is devoid of the power to love. There is some good in the worst of us and some evil in the best of us. When we discover this, we are less prone to hate our enemies.
2714.author: Martin Luther King, Jr.

2715.quote: Heavy hearts, like heavy clouds in the sky, are best relieved by the letting of a little water.
2715.author: Christopher Morley

2716.quote: My best friend is the man who in wishing me well wishes it for my sake.
2716.author: Aristotle

2717.quote: The best argument against democracy is a five-minute conversation with the average voter.
2717.author: Winston Churchill

2718.quote: Good teachers know how to bring out the best in students.
2718.author: Charles Kuralt

2719.quote: The best part about being alone is that you really don't have to answer to anybody. You do what you want.
2719.author: Justin Timberlake

2720.quote: Age appears to be best in four things; old wood best to burn, old wine to drink, old friends to trust, and old authors to read.
2720.author: Francis Bacon

2721.quote: I look my best when I'm totally free, on holiday, walking on the beach.
2721.author: Rosamund Pike

2722.quote: One of the best ways to make yourself happy in the present is to recall happy times from the past. Photos are a great memory-prompt, and because we tend to take photos of happy occasions, they weight our memories to the good.
2722.author: Gretchen Rubin

2723.quote: Speak when you are angry - and you'll make the best speech you'll ever regret.
2723.author: Laurence J. Peter

2724.quote: At the end of the day, life is about being happy being who you are, and I feel like we are so blessed to have the support system and the best family to really just support each other no matter what we're going through.
2724.author: Kim Kardashian

2725.quote: Our flag honors those who have fought to protect it, and is a reminder of the sacrifice of our nation's founders and heroes. As the ultimate icon of America's storied history, the Stars and Stripes represents the very best of this nation.
2725.author: Joe Barton

2726.quote: All the adversity I've had in my life, all my troubles and obstacles, have strengthened me... You may not realize it when it happens, but a kick in the teeth may be the best thing in the world for you.
2726.author: Walt Disney

2727.quote: Write it on your heart that every day is the best day in the year.
2727.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

2728.quote: The best part of beauty is that which no picture can express.
2728.author: Francis Bacon

2729.quote: Battle is the most magnificent competition in which a human being can indulge. It brings out all that is best; it removes all that is base. All men are afraid in battle. The coward is the one who lets his fear overcome his sense of duty. Duty is the essence of manhood.
2729.author: George S. Patton

2730.quote: Smiling is definitely one of the best beauty remedies. If you have a good sense of humor and a good approach to life, that's beautiful.
2730.author: Rashida Jones

2732.quote: Far and away the best prize that life has to offer is the chance to work hard at work worth doing.
2732.author: Theodore Roosevelt

2733.quote: You don't fight racism with racism, the best way to fight racism is with solidarity.
2733.author: Bobby Seale

2734.quote: The best years of your life are the ones in which you decide your problems are your own. You do not blame them on your mother, the ecology, or the president. You realize that you control your own destiny.
2734.author: Albert Ellis

2735.quote: I am prepared for the worst, but hope for the best.
2735.author: Benjamin Disraeli

2736.quote: Things are never quite as scary when you've got a best friend.
2736.author: Bill Watterson

2737.quote: Men are like wine - some turn to vinegar, but the best improve with age.
2737.author: Pope John XXIII

2738.quote: Education is the best friend. An educated person is respected everywhere. Education beats the beauty and the youth.
2738.author: Chanakya

2739.quote: God always gives His best to those who leave the choice with him.
2739.author: Jim Elliot

2740.quote: My mama always used to tell me: 'If you can't find somethin' to live for, you best find somethin' to die for.'
2740.author: Tupac Shakur

2741.quote: Happiness does not come from doing easy work but from the afterglow of satisfaction that comes after the achievement of a difficult task that demanded our best.
2741.author: Theodore Isaac Rubin

2742.quote: Technology can be our best friend, and technology can also be the biggest party pooper of our lives. It interrupts our own story, interrupts our ability to have a thought or a daydream, to imagine something wonderful, because we're too busy bridging the walk from the cafeteria back to the office on the cell phone.
2742.author: Steven Spielberg

2743.quote: I'm just thankful for everything, all the blessings in my life, trying to stay that way. I think that's the best way to start your day and finish your day. It keeps everything in perspective.
2743.author: Tim Tebow

2744.quote: Our prayers should be for blessings in general, for God knows best what is good for us.
2744.author: Socrates

2745.quote: She's always there for me when I need her; She's my best friend; she's just my everything.
2745.author: Ashley Olsen

2746.quote: I think it's very important to have a feedback loop, where you're constantly thinking about what you've done and how you could be doing it better. I think that's the single best piece of advice: constantly think about how you could be doing things better and questioning yourself.
2746.author: Elon Musk

2747.quote: My best friend is the most important girl, outside of family, to me. I met her when I went to college and we bonded immediately. I'd do anything for her at any time. We phone each other every day.
2747.author: Dawn French

2748.quote: In times of great stress or adversity, it's always best to keep busy, to plow your anger and your energy into something positive.
2748.author: Lee Iacocca

2749.quote: Heroes represent the best of ourselves, respecting that we are human beings. A hero can be anyone from Gandhi to your classroom teacher, anyone who can show courage when faced with a problem. A hero is someone who is willing to help others in his or her best capacity.
2749.author: Ricky Martin

2750.quote: Experience hath shewn, that even under the best forms of government those entrusted with power have, in time, and by slow operations, perverted it into tyranny.
2750.author: Thomas Jefferson

2751.quote: Words empty as the wind are best left unsaid.
2751.author: Homer

2752.quote: A failure is not always a mistake, it may simply be the best one can do under the circumstances. The real mistake is to stop trying.
2752.author: B. F. Skinner

2753.quote: The best remedy for those who are afraid, lonely or unhappy is to go outside, somewhere where they can be quiet, alone with the heavens, nature and God. Because only then does one feel that all is as it should be.
2753.author: Anne Frank

2754.quote: I think that's the single best piece of advice: constantly think about how you could be doing things better and questioning yourself.
2754.author: Elon Musk

2755.quote: The best way out is always through.
2755.author: Robert Frost

2756.quote: And while the law of competition may be sometimes hard for the individual, it is best for the race, because it ensures the survival of the fittest in every department.
2756.author: Andrew Carnegie

2757.quote: Government, even in its best state, is but a necessary evil; in its worst state, an intolerable one.
2757.author: Thomas Paine

2758.quote: Champions are not the ones who always win races - champions are the ones who get out there and try. And try harder the next time. And even harder the next time. 'Champion' is a state of mind. They are devoted. They compete to best themselves as much if not more than they compete to best others. Champions are not just athletes.
2758.author: Simon Sinek

2759.quote: Nobody can predict the future. You just have to give your all to the relationship you're in and do your best to take care of your partner, communicate and give them every last drop of love you have. I think one of the most important things in a relationship is caring for your significant other through good times and bad.
2759.author: Nick Cannon

2760.quote: With me, what you see is what you get. Yes, call me naive, but I love life. I am happy, and for that, I make no apologies. I do like to see the best in people, and when someone is nice to my face, I tend to believe them.
2760.author: Joyce Giraud

2761.quote: When you have balance in your life, work becomes an entirely different experience. There is a passion that moves you to a whole new level of fulfillment and gratitude, and that's when you can do your best... for yourself and for others.
2761.author: Cara Delevingne

2762.quote: Walking is the best possible exercise. Habituate yourself to walk very far.
2762.author: Thomas Jefferson

2763.quote: Work hard, stay positive, and get up early. It's the best part of the day.
2763.author: George Allen, Sr.

2764.quote: The ladder of success is best climbed by stepping on the rungs of opportunity.
2764.author: Ayn Rand

2765.quote: The will to work of everyone in the country is the best guarantee of national survival.
2765.author: Bhumibol Adulyadej

2766.quote: Outside of a dog, a book is a man's best friend. Inside of a dog it's too dark to read.
2766.author: Groucho Marx

2767.quote: The best protection any woman can have... is courage.
2767.author: Elizabeth Cady Stanton

2768.quote: Sometimes when you innovate, you make mistakes. It is best to admit them quickly, and get on with improving your other innovations.
2768.author: Steve Jobs

2769.quote: It's lovely being a parent and being in a strong marriage with somebody who is your best friend.
2769.author: Johnny Vegas

2770.quote: I believe God is managing affairs and that He doesn't need any advice from me. With God in charge, I believe everything will work out for the best in the end. So what is there to worry about.
2770.author: Henry Ford

2771.quote: Laughter is not at all a bad beginning for a friendship, and it is far the best ending for one.
2771.author: Oscar Wilde

2772.quote: I prefer to win titles with the team ahead of individual awards or scoring more goals than anyone else. I'm more worried about being a good person than being the best football player in the world. When all this is over, what are you left with? When I retire, I hope I am remembered for being a decent guy.
2772.author: Lionel Messi

2773.quote: The human body is the best picture of the human soul.
2773.author: Ludwig Wittgenstein

2774.quote: Baseball was, is and always will be to me the best game in the world.
2774.author: Babe Ruth

2775.quote: The best weapon against an enemy is another enemy.
2775.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

2776.quote: Openness, transparency - these are among the few weapons the citizenry has to protect itself from the powerful and the corrupt... and that is the best thing that WikiLeaks has done.
2776.author: Michael Moore

2777.quote: Only the mediocre are always at their best.
2777.author: Jean Giraudoux

2778.quote: One's philosophy is not best expressed in words; it is expressed in the choices one makes... and the choices we make are ultimately our responsibility.
2778.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

2779.quote: If it's your job to eat a frog, it's best to do it first thing in the morning. And If it's your job to eat two frogs, it's best to eat the biggest one first.
2779.author: Mark Twain

2780.quote: A man's friendships are one of the best measures of his worth.
2780.author: Charles Darwin

2781.quote: Every age has its storytelling form, and video gaming is a huge part of our culture. You can ignore or embrace video games and imbue them with the best artistic quality. People are enthralled with video games in the same way as other people love the cinema or theatre.
2781.author: Andy Serkis

2782.quote: Employees are a company's greatest asset - they're your competitive advantage. You want to attract and retain the best; provide them with encouragement, stimulus, and make them feel that they are an integral part of the company's mission.
2782.author: Anne M. Mulcahy

2783.quote: A large income is the best recipe for happiness I ever heard of.
2783.author: Jane Austen

2784.quote: Difficult times often bring out the best in people.
2784.author: Bernie Sanders

2785.quote: With modeling, you pose. You want to look your best all the time. With acting, you have to be aware of the camera, but the more you show your imperfections, the better you're going to be.
2785.author: Diane Kruger

2786.quote: When everything is lonely I can be my best friend.
2786.author: Conor Oberst

2787.quote: I love natural beauty, and I think it's your best look, but I think makeup as an artist is so transformative.
2787.author: Marina and the Diamonds

2788.quote: A person who has been punished is not less inclined to behave in a given way; at best, he learns how to avoid punishment.
2788.author: B. F. Skinner

2789.quote: A wise man is superior to any insults which can be put upon him, and the best reply to unseemly behavior is patience and moderation.
2789.author: Moliere

2790.quote: I think you make the best with what you've got, you know? Sometimes you have very little. And you just always try to rise to higher ground, because you're going to suffer one way or the other, so you just hope that you have strength and perseverance and good friends and faith, some kind of faith, to endure and move on to greener pastures.
2790.author: Pierce Brosnan

2791.quote: Yes'm, old friends is always best, 'less you can catch a new one that's fit to make an old one out of.
2791.author: Sarah Orne Jewett

2792.quote: He who laughs most, learns best.
2792.author: John Cleese

2793.quote: The only way to get the best of an argument is to avoid it.
2793.author: Dale Carnegie

2794.quote: I'm human, I'm not perfect. I make mistakes all the time, but I guess my job is to keep those mistakes to myself, which I'm already fine doing and just try to be the best I can be for those kids.
2794.author: Selena Gomez

2795.quote: My cell phone is my best friend. It's my lifeline to the outside world.
2795.author: Carrie Underwood

2796.quote: Arrogance, ignorance, and incompetence. Not a pretty cocktail of personality traits in the best of situations. No sirree. Not a pretty cocktail in an office-mate and not a pretty cocktail in a head of state. In fact, in a leader, it's a lethal cocktail.
2796.author: Graydon Carter

2797.quote: Science is simply common sense at its best, that is, rigidly accurate in observation, and merciless to fallacy in logic.
2797.author: Thomas Huxley

2798.quote: It is not enough to do your best; you must know what to do, and then do your best.
2798.author: W. Edwards Deming

2799.quote: Climate change is destroying our path to sustainability. Ours is a world of looming challenges and increasingly limited resources. Sustainable development offers the best chance to adjust our course.
2799.author: Ban Ki-moon

2800.quote: Every man, every woman who has to take up the service of government, must ask themselves two questions: 'Do I love my people in order to serve them better? Am I humble and do I listen to everybody, to diverse opinions in order to choose the best path?' If you don't ask those questions, your governance will not be good.
2800.author: Pope Francis

2801.quote: Voting is a right best exercised by people who have taken time to learn about the issues.
2801.author: Tony Snow

2802.quote: Every kid has a toy that they believe is their best friend, that they believe communicates with them, and they imagine it being alive, their toy horse or car or whatever it is. Stop-motion is the only medium where we literally can make a toy come to life, an actual object.
2802.author: Henry Selick

2803.quote: It's a matter of taking the side of the weak against the strong, something the best people have always done.
2803.author: Harriet Beecher Stowe

2804.quote: When you do something best in life, you don't really want to give that up - and for me it's tennis.
2804.author: Roger Federer

2805.quote: 'Thank you' is the best prayer that anyone could say. I say that one a lot. Thank you expresses extreme gratitude, humility, understanding.
2805.author: Alice Walker

2806.quote: The Lord gets his best soldiers out of the highlands of affliction.
2806.author: Charles Spurgeon

2807.quote: I'm not afraid of working hard at anything, whatever it is. I just always want to be the best that I can.
2807.author: Gisele Bundchen

2808.quote: Today you are you! That is truer than true! There is no one alive who is you-er than you!
2808.author: Dr. Seuss

2809.quote: God gave us the gift of life; it is up to us to give ourselves the gift of living well.
2809.author: Voltaire

2810.quote: A birthday is just another day where you go to work and people give you love. Age is just a state of mind, and you are as old as you think you are. You have to count your blessings and be happy.
2810.author: Abhishek Bachchan

2811.quote: Let us never know what old age is. Let us know the happiness time brings, not count the years.
2811.author: Ausonius

2812.quote: There are two great days in a person's life - the day we are born and the day we discover why.
2812.author: William Barclay

2813.quote: The more you praise and celebrate your life, the more there is in life to celebrate.
2813.author: Oprah Winfrey

2814.quote: It takes a long time to become young.
2814.author: Pablo Picasso

2815.quote: Age is a case of mind over matter. If you don't mind, it don't matter.
2815.author: Satchel Paige

2816.quote: Cakes are special. Every birthday, every celebration ends with something sweet, a cake, and people remember. It's all about the memories.
2816.author: Buddy Valastro

2817.quote: Let us celebrate the occasion with wine and sweet words.
2817.author: Plautus

2818.quote: How old would you be if you didn't know how old you are?
2818.author: Satchel Paige

2819.quote: The greatest gift that you can give to others is the gift of unconditional love and acceptance.
2819.author: Brian Tracy

2820.quote: The way I see it, you should live everyday like its your birthday.
2820.author: Paris Hilton

2821.quote: If you look over the years, the styles have changed - the clothes, the hair, the production, the approach to the songs. The icing to the cake has changed flavors. But if you really look at the cake itself, it's really the same.
2821.author: John Oates

2822.quote: The greatest gifts you can give your children are the roots of responsibility and the wings of independence.
2822.author: Denis Waitley

2824.quote: Don't just count your years, make your years count.
2824.author: George Meredith

2825.quote: All the world is birthday cake, so take a piece, but not too much.
2825.author: George Harrison

2826.quote: Our birthdays are feathers in the broad wing of time.
2826.author: Jean Paul

2827.quote: I remember when the candle shop burned down. Everyone stood around singing 'Happy Birthday.'
2827.author: Steven Wright

2828.quote: The great thing about getting older is that you don't lose all the other ages you've been.
2828.author: Madeleine L'Engle

2829.quote: You take away all the other luxuries in life, and if you can make someone smile and laugh, you have given the most special gift: happiness.
2829.author: Brad Garrett

2830.quote: Most of us can remember a time when a birthday - especially if it was one's own - brightened the world as if a second sun has risen.
2830.author: Robert Staughton Lynd

2831.quote: You know you're getting old when the candles cost more than the cake.
2831.author: Bob Hope

2832.quote: Presents don't really mean much to me. I don't want to sound mawkish, but - it was the realization that I have a great many people in my life who really love me, and who I really love.
2832.author: Gabriel Byrne

2833.quote: To me - old age is always ten years older than I am.
2833.author: Bernard Baruch

2834.quote: My policy on cake is pro having it and pro eating it.
2834.author: Boris Johnson

2835.quote: When someone asks if you'd like cake or pie, why not say you want cake and pie?
2835.author: Lisa Loeb

2836.quote: For my birthday I got a humidifier and a de-humidifier... I put them in the same room and let them fight it out.
2836.author: Steven Wright

2837.quote: Love the giver more than the gift.
2837.author: Brigham Young

2838.quote: The return of my birthday, if I remember it, fills me with thoughts which it seems to be the general care of humanity to escape.
2838.author: Samuel Johnson

2839.quote: I intend to live forever. So far, so good.
2839.author: Steven Wright

2840.quote: I had a birthday one night on a farm we were shooting on. I walked into the tent, and there were 150 people waiting for me, all wearing masks of my face.
2840.author: Stephen Hopkins

2841.quote: People give one another things that can't be gift wrapped.
2841.author: Nadine Gordimer

2842.quote: Your children need your presence more than your presents.
2842.author: Jesse Jackson

2843.quote: For my birthday this year, my girlfriends - who knew I'd just inherited my dad's turntable - gave me a carton of albums like 'Blue Kentucky Girl,' by Emmylou Harris, and 'Off the Wall,' by Michael Jackson. It's all stuff we grew up with. I mean, you can't have a music collection without Prince's 'Purple Rain' - it just can't be done!
2843.author: Connie Britton

2844.quote: I kept a diary right after I was born. Day 1: Tired from the move. Day 2: Everyone thinks I'm an idiot.
2844.author: Steven Wright

2845.quote: I like birthday cake. It's so symbolic. It's a tempting symbol to load with something more complicated than just 'Happy birthday!' because it's this emblem of childhood and a happy day.
2845.author: Aimee Bender

2846.quote: My life is better with every year of living it.
2846.author: Rachel Maddow

2847.quote: A gift consists not in what is done or given, but in the intention of the giver or doer.
2847.author: Lucius Annaeus Seneca

2848.quote: There are three hundred and sixty-four days when you might get un-birthday presents, and only one for birthday presents, you know.
2848.author: Lewis Carroll

2849.quote: It's odd the things that people remember. Parents will arrange a birthday party, certain it will stick in your mind forever. You'll have a nice time, then two years later you'll be like, 'There was a pony there? Really? And a clown with one leg?'
2849.author: David Sedaris

2850.quote: The main prank that we play with props is for people's birthdays. The special effects people will put a little explosive in the cake so it blows up in their face - that's always fun to play on a guest star, or one of the trainees or someone who's new.
2850.author: Catherine Bell

2851.quote: A gift, with a kind countenance, is a double present.
2851.author: Thomas Fuller

2852.quote: My biggest hero, Gregory Peck, was my birthday present on April 14, 1973. I just sat and stared at him.
2852.author: Loretta Lynn

2853.quote: I think there's something about the homemade birthday cake, because my wife, on my daughter's first birthday, started the tradition where she takes a full cake and cuts the number birthday out of it.
2853.author: Willie Geist

2854.quote: For my birthday my husband learned to cook and is cooking one day a week for me. But he only likes to do fancy dishes. So we end up with weird, obscure things in the refrigerator.
2854.author: Cheryl Hines

2855.quote: When I was in elementary school, I used to write letters to myself. I'd write letters and go 'Dear Kristen-at-16-years-old, happy birthday. I hope you're doing something.'
2855.author: Kristin Kreuk

2856.quote: The best way to remember your wife's birthday is to forget it once.
2856.author: E. Joseph Cossman
