2857.quote: I have an extensive library - every birthday when I was a kid my parents would ask what movie or book I wanted, so I have built up a big collection over the years.
2857.author: Mark Bridges

2858.quote: At my age flowers scare me.
2858.author: George Burns

2859.quote: I jumped out of an airplane on my 34th birthday because I promised myself I would. I have an interest in confronting my fears.
2859.author: Michael Trucco

2860.quote: If I have the power to post 'Happy Birthday' on someone's Facebook page and make them feel really good, it feels really good to make other people feel really good. I love it. I'm a huge Facebook and Twitter person. And I love talking to my fans. It's fun.
2860.author: Rebecca Mader

2861.quote: The worst part about celebrating another birthday is the shock that you're only as well as you are.
2861.author: Anne Lamott

2862.quote: My ace in the hole as a human being used to be my capacity for remembering birthdays. I worked at it. Whenever I made a new friend, I made a point of finding out his or her birthday early on, and I would record it in my Filofax calendar.
2862.author: Susan Orlean

2863.quote: I'm a summer baby, so I usually have my birthday as a good summer memory.
2863.author: Sloane Crosley

2864.quote: I don't pay attention to the number of birthdays. It's weird when I say I'm 53. It just is crazy that I'm 53. I think I'm very immature. I feel like a kid. That's why my back goes out all the time, because I completely forget I can't do certain things anymore - like doing the plank for 10 minutes.
2864.author: Ellen DeGeneres

2865.quote: I'm not materialistic. I believe in presents from the heart, like a drawing that a child does.
2865.author: Victoria Beckham

2866.quote: It was on my fifth birthday that Papa put his hand on my shoulder and said, 'Remember, my son, if you ever need a helping hand, you'll find one at the end of your arm.'
2866.author: Sam Levenson

2868.quote: The only thing better than singing is more singing.
2868.author: Ella Fitzgerald

2869.quote: When I was young and it was someone's birthday, I didn't have the money to buy nice presents so I would take my mom's camera and make a movie parody for whoever's birthday it was. When I'd show it them, they'd die laughing. That reaction was a high for me, and I loved that feeling.
2869.author: David Henrie

2870.quote: I do like to shock and surprise people. When it's all in good fun, of course.
2870.author: Ruth Warrick

2871.quote: I think, at a child's birth, if a mother could ask a fairy godmother to endow it with the most useful gift, that gift should be curiosity.
2871.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

2872.quote: You know you're getting old when you get that one candle on the cake. It's like, 'See if you can blow this out.'
2872.author: Jerry Seinfeld

2873.quote: There is still no cure for the common birthday.
2873.author: John Glenn

2874.quote: I quit high school on my birthday. It was my senior year and I didn't see the point. This was 1962, and I was ready to make music.
2874.author: Barry White

2875.quote: You don't get older, you get better.
2875.author: Shirley Bassey

2876.quote: At her birthday, my seven-year-old daughter will say that she wants these big cakes and certain expensive toys as presents, and I can't say no to her. It would just break my heart. But when I was little, for birthdays we just played outside and we were happy if we got any cake.
2876.author: Goran Ivanisevic

2877.quote: I was forced to live far beyond my years when just a child, now I have reversed the order and I intend to remain young indefinitely.
2877.author: Mary Pickford

2878.quote: Handmade presents are scary because they reveal that you have too much free time.
2878.author: Douglas Coupland

2879.quote: I like to go to anybody else's birthday, and if I'm invited I'm a good guest. But I never celebrate my birthdays. I really don't care.
2879.author: Mikhail Baryshnikov

2880.quote: Every day, every birthday candle I blow out, every penny I throw over my shoulder in a wishing well, every time my daughter says, 'Let's make a wish on a star,' there's one thing I wish for: wisdom.
2880.author: Rene Russo

2881.quote: It is lovely, when I forget all birthdays, including my own, to find that somebody remembers me.
2881.author: Ellen Glasgow

2882.quote: My happiest memory of childhood was my first birthday in reform school. This teacher took an interest in me. In fact, he gave me the first birthday presents I ever got: a box of Cracker Jacks and a can of ABC shoe polish.
2882.author: Flip Wilson

2883.quote: Every year on your birthday, you get a chance to start new.
2883.author: Sammy Hagar

2884.quote: I cried on my 18th birthday. I thought 17 was such a nice age. You're young enough to get away with things, but you're old enough, too.
2884.author: Liv Tyler

2885.quote: I binge when I'm happy. When everything is going really well, every day is like I'm at a birthday party.
2885.author: Kirstie Alley

2886.quote: As a child, I always chose a false nose and some face paint and a wig for my birthday.
2886.author: Ashley Jensen

2887.quote: I get uncomfortable when people give me presents and watch me open them. I don't have birthday parties, because the idea of a group of people singing and looking at me while I'm blowing out candles gives me hives.
2887.author: Brit Marling

2888.quote: To give somebody your time is the biggest gift you can give.
2888.author: Franka Potente

2889.quote: I love a card. You know, cards? At birthdays? I collect them.
2889.author: Adele

2890.quote: I have 'Happy Birthday' in multiple languages on my iPod - I like to play it at company birthday parties.
2890.author: Yigal Azrouel

2891.quote: My mom FedExes a red velvet cake she makes from scratch to me every birthday.
2891.author: Molly Sims

2892.quote: My mother asked me what I wanted for my birthday, so I said I wanted to read poetry with her.
2892.author: Guy Johnson

2893.quote: We'll take the cake with the red cherry on top.
2893.author: Navjot Singh Sidhu

2894.quote: If every year is a marble, how many marbles do you have left? How many sunrises, how many opportunities to rise to the full stature of your being?
2894.author: Joy Page

2895.quote: When I was little I thought, isn't it nice that everybody celebrates on my birthday? Because it's July 4th.
2895.author: Gloria Stuart

2896.quote: On every birthday, I ask my wife, 'What would you like this year?' and her instant reply is, 'Diamonds! Diamonds! Diamonds!' I'm always living in hope that one day she'll say she just wants me!
2896.author: Akshay Kumar

2897.quote: We all have special numbers in our lives, and 4 is that for me. It's the day I was born. My mother's birthday, and a lot of my friends' birthdays, are on the fourth; April 4 is my wedding date.
2897.author: Beyonce Knowles

2898.quote: I love the big fresh starts, the clean slates like birthdays and new years, but I also really like the idea that we can get up every morning and start over.
2898.author: Kristin Armstrong

2899.quote: For me, the end of childhood came when the number of candles on my birthday cake no longer reflected my age, around 19 or 20. From then on, each candle came to represent an entire decade.
2899.author: Yotam Ottolenghi

2900.quote: I wanted to buy a candle holder, but the store didn't have one. So I got a cake.
2900.author: Mitch Hedberg

2901.quote: If I could be doing anything, I'd be laying on the floor in my birthday suit eating junk food and watching something dumb on TV.
2901.author: Anita Baker

2902.quote: We have to be able to grow up. Our wrinkles are our medals of the passage of life. They are what we have been through and who we want to be.
2902.author: Lauren Hutton

2903.quote: Every year on my birthday, I start a new playlist titled after my current age so I can keep track of my favorite songs of the year as a sort of musical diary because I am a teenage girl.
2903.author: Chris Hardwick

2904.quote: If you can give your child only one gift, let it be enthusiasm.
2904.author: Bruce Barton

2905.quote: I like to give people novels I think they would like, on no particular occasion - just when we're in a bookstore together. I like to receive reference books on my birthday.
2905.author: Daniel Handler

2906.quote: I am a big popcorn fanatic. I love popcorn. In fact one year for my birthday, my husband bought me one of those big popcorn machines like they have in movie theaters.
2906.author: Debbie Macomber

2907.quote: A friend never defends a husband who gets his wife an electric skillet for her birthday.
2907.author: Erma Bombeck

2908.quote: To my surprise, my 70s are nicer than my 60s and my 60s than my 50s, and I wouldn't wish my teens and 20s on my enemies.
2908.author: Lionel Blue

2909.quote: The reason I met my husband was because I remembered a friend's birthday. The moral of the story is: Remember people's birthdays.
2909.author: Julianna Margulies

2910.quote: In 1993 my birthday present was a star on Hollywood's Walk of Fame.
2910.author: Annette Funicello

2911.quote: Like many women my age, I am 28 years old.
2911.author: Mary Schmich

2912.quote: I'm amazed. When I was 40, I thought I'd never make 50. And at 50 I thought the frosting on the cake would be 60. At 60, I was still going strong and enjoying everything.
2912.author: Gloria Stuart

2913.quote: Only then, approaching my fortieth birthday, I made philosophy my life's work.
2913.author: Karl Jaspers

2914.quote: I'm not going to be caught around here for any fool celebration. To hell with birthdays!
2914.author: Norman Rockwell

2915.quote: This is a wonderful way to celebrate an 80th birthday... I wanted to be 65 again, but they wouldn't let me - Homeland Security.
2915.author: Art Buchwald

2916.quote: My mother still sends a cake to the office for my birthday.
2916.author: David Ulevitch

2917.quote: A diplomat is a man who always remembers a woman's birthday but never remembers her age.
2917.author: Robert Frost

2918.quote: Any time women come together with a collective intention, it's a powerful thing. Whether it's sitting down making a quilt, in a kitchen preparing a meal, in a club reading the same book, or around the table playing cards, or planning a birthday party, when women come together with a collective intention, magic happens.
2918.author: Phylicia Rashad

2919.quote: Some people won't go the extra mile, and then on their birthday, when no one makes a fuss, they feel neglected and bitter.
2919.author: Anne Lamott

2920.quote: The more Mommy blogs going nuclear over playground etiquette I read and birthday parties of glazed adults munching cupcakes like demoralized zombies I attend, I realize this is what my friends who conceived before me meant by, 'You just won't care.'
2920.author: Emma McLaughlin

2921.quote: When I was a kid, for my birthday every year, my mother made me pasta bechamel, which is rigatoni with a white cream sauce.
2921.author: Giada De Laurentiis

2922.quote: New Year's Day is every man's birthday.
2922.author: Charles Lamb

2923.quote: I'm not a big birthday guy; I never have been.
2923.author: Lewis Black

2924.quote: I wanted Cathy and Irving to actually say 'I do' and be pronounced husband and wife on Feb. 5, which is my mom's birthday.
2924.author: Cathy Guisewite

2925.quote: About astrology and palmistry: they are good because they make people vivid and full of possibilities. They are communism at its best. Everybody has a birthday and almost everybody has a palm.
2925.author: Kurt Vonnegut

2926.quote: I threw my 20th birthday party at Brown, and I didn't even have to say to anyone not to put pictures on Facebook. Not a single picture went up. That was when I knew I'd found a solid group of friends, and I felt like I belonged.
2926.author: Emma Watson

2927.quote: In the Mexican culture, we never miss a baptism, a birthday, a baby shower, a wedding shower, a wedding. You must show up. Otherwise, you'll be in big trouble.
2927.author: Eva Longoria

2928.quote: The day which we fear as our last is but the birthday of eternity.
2928.author: Lucius Annaeus Seneca

2929.quote: Anybody can have a birthday. It requires nothing. Murderers have birthdays. It's the opposite of anything that I believe in. And I don't like at work where you stop everything to sing 'Happy Birthday' to someone. I feel like that's for children.
2929.author: Mindy Kaling

2930.quote: John Candy knew he was going to die. He told me on his 40th birthday. He said, well, Maureen, I'm on borrowed time.
2930.author: Maureen O'Hara

2931.quote: The American flag is an enduring symbol of liberty, democracy, and justice. It is fitting that the House act to protect it as we approach our nation's birthday, and as our men and women in uniform rally behind it in Iraq's battlefields.
2931.author: Joe Barton

2932.quote: I can still remember the afternoon, on my 15th birthday, when I opened up 'The Virgin and the Gypsy,' D.H. Lawrence's novella, in my tiny cell in boarding school, and whole worlds of possibility opened out that I had never guessed existed. The language was on fire and sang of liberation.
2932.author: Pico Iyer

2933.quote: I was honoured when they asked me to appear at the president's birthday rally in Madison Square Garden. There was like a hush over the whole place when I came on to sing 'Happy Birthday,' like if I had been wearing a slip, I would have thought it was showing or something. I thought, 'Oh, my gosh, what if no sound comes out!'
2933.author: Marilyn Monroe

2934.quote: I had Hallowe'en parties every year, as it was my birthday five days before. My parents would actually put prosthetic noses on, and my dad would wear a top-hat and tails, put on a fake curly moustache, and hold a pipe.
2934.author: Bat for Lashes

2935.quote: I was standing right behind Marilyn, completely invisible, when she sang 'Happy birthday, Mr. President.' And indeed, the corny thing happened: Her dress split for my benefit, and there was Marilyn, and yes, indeed, she didn't wear any underwear.
2935.author: Mike Nichols

2936.quote: I'm most comfortable in my birthday suit.
2936.author: Amanda Seyfried

2937.quote: I want to say that probably 24 hours after I told CBS that I was stepping down at my 65th birthday, I was already regretting it. And I regretted it every day since.
2937.author: Walter Cronkite

2938.quote: I saw Richard Linklater's film 'Slacker' for my twenty-first birthday. That was the moment when it all seemed possible. This guy gave me hope.
2938.author: Kevin Smith

2939.quote: I promised myself: Before your 18th birthday, you're going to be at Jean Paul Gaultier. And it worked. I was hired.
2939.author: Nicolas Ghesquiere

2940.quote: I joined the army on my seventeenth birthday, full of the romance of war after having read a lot of World War I British poetry and having seen a lot of post-World War II films. I thought the romantic presentations of war influenced my joining and my presentation of war to my younger siblings.
2940.author: Walter Dean Myers

2941.quote: I have an ambivalent relationship with Margaret Thatcher. She came to power in May 1979 - a month before my 11th birthday. I was far too young to have developed a great deal of political awareness. I remember it, though - my mother excited at the dinner table because Britain had its first female prime minister.
2941.author: Sara Sheridan

2942.quote: I turned 40 on the set of the reunion show for 'Sheer Genius,' so it wasn't a hideous birthday because I had everyone on the cast and crew sing 'Happy Birthday' to me, and I won $10,000 for being the fan favorite. It was really liberating to turn 40 and realize that I felt very comfortable with myself and knew who I was.
2942.author: Tabatha Coffey

2943.quote: I have been a frequent air traveler since I was a few months shy of my sixth birthday, when my parents packed me off to boarding school two plane rides away from home. Those days of being willingly handed from air hostess to air hostess as an 'unaccompanied minor' made me blase about the rigors of air travel.
2943.author: Shashi Tharoor

2944.quote: For my 50th birthday, I got ahold of a new print of 'Saturday Night Fever.' I see it much more as a tough coming-of-age movie than as a disco story.
2944.author: Gene Siskel

2945.quote: I wrapped my Christmas presents early this year, but I used the wrong paper. See, the paper I used said 'Happy Birthday' on it. I didn't want to waste it so I just wrote 'Jesus' on it.
2945.author: Demetri Martin

2946.quote: I played rugby for years, and I had a rugby jacket that I lost when I was 14. Somehow, my brother found it in storage 15 years later, and he gave it back to me for my 30th birthday. That was amazing and probably one of the best gifts I've ever received.
2946.author: Ryan Reynolds

2947.quote: Mum loves me being famous! She is so excited and proud, as she had me so young and couldn't support me, so I am living her dream, it's sweeter for both of us. It's her 40th birthday soon and I'm going to buy her 40 presents.
2947.author: Adele

2948.quote: I wanted to be the next Dana Carvey. This was my ultimate goal. If I ever cut into a birthday cake and made a wish, I would wish to be on 'Saturday Night Live.' If I threw a coin into a fountain, I would wish to be on 'Saturday Night Live.' If I saw a shooting star, I would wish to be on 'Saturday Night Live.'
2948.author: Jimmy Fallon

2949.quote: The turning point was when I hit my 30th birthday. I thought, if really want to write, it's time to start. I picked up the book How to Write a Novel in 90 Days. The author said to just write three pages a day, and I figured, I can do this. I never got past Page 3 of that book.
2949.author: James Rollins

2950.quote: The Queen of Crafts herself, Martha Stewart, and I have the same birthday. I prefer to think it's the glue-gun wielding, perfect-tart-producing Martha and not the copper pan-throwing, jail-going Martha. But I suppose if I am going to share a calendar square with some of Martha, I have to share it with all of Martha.
2950.author: Sloane Crosley

2951.quote: I've always wanted to buy a sports car. After the England series, I went up to my dad and said that I wanted to buy a sports car and got his consent. On his birthday, I surprised him by bringing it home. It's a Porsche Boxter Limited Edition, and my family was thrilled to see it.
2951.author: Suresh Raina

2952.quote: And currently, there are four to five new works in the pipeline for upcoming celebrations such as the Sydney 2000 Olympics, Australian Federation, my 50th Birthday, and Sydney Dance Company's 25th Anniversary.
2952.author: Graeme Murphy

2953.quote: I can sing 'Happy Birthday' to you in twelve different places, but one of them is going to make you feel a certain thing, maybe it's a vulnerability, maybe an innocence, maybe another way is sexy and soulful or bluesy whatever it is, but with singers, exploring keys, I think, is important.
2953.author: Idina Menzel

2954.quote: I had the worst birthday party ever when I was a child because my parents hired a pony to give rides. And these ponies are never in good health. But this one dropped dead. It just wasn't much fun after that. One kid would sit on him and the rest of us would drag him around.
2954.author: Rita Rudner

2955.quote: I believe that at least 70 percent of parenting goes to the mother. In our house, I'm the one who knows about all the school stuff, helps with the homework, organizes the play dates, and remembers the birthday parties.
2955.author: Cindy Crawford

2956.quote: The first memory I have in the world is of death and tears. That is how I would mark the beginning of my life: the way people mark the end of one. My family had gathered at Papa Joe's house because Mam' Grace was slipping away, only I didn't register it that way. For some reason I thought that it was her birthday.
2956.author: Charles M. Blow

2957.quote: Washington's birthday is worthy of celebration - he is one of the greatest men in history. But Washington himself would likely have seen celebration of the office of the presidency itself as monarchic in nature.
2957.author: Ben Shapiro

2958.quote: I was born full grown in the middle of a hurricane and an earthquake on 10 September 1954, 12.52 P.M. When I found out that I had missed lunch, I gave such a shout that the Earth stopped and spun backwards two days. That's why I celebrate my birthday on 8 September.
2958.author: Jon Scieszka

2959.quote: I'm trying to get the record that I made at my birthday party last year, trying to get that out, and the lawyers are diddling around with it and it probably won't be out until next year. I don't know.
2959.author: Marian McPartland

2960.quote: I've looked after my money. As I started working around my third birthday, my first check went straight to the bank.
2960.author: Samantha Barks

2961.quote: When I was six, my best friend's parents bought him a piano. My mother noticed that every time I would go to his house, the first thing I would say to him was 'Levester' - His name was Levester - I said, 'Levester, can I go play your piano?' So, on my 7th birthday, my parents bought me a piano.
2961.author: Herbie Hancock

2962.quote: It was my 16th birthday - my mom and dad gave me my Goya classical guitar that day. I sat down, wrote this song, and I just knew that that was the only thing I could ever really do - write songs and sing them to people.
2962.author: Stevie Nicks

2963.quote: Funny story: I was hanging out with Adam Shankman for Samantha Ronson's birthday, and Lance Bass was there. I don't really know Lance, but he comes over to me and goes, 'Hey, I just wanted to let you know I'm a fan of 'Pretty Little Liars' and I'm rooting for your character.' It was surreal! That's how 'PLL' has changed my life.
2963.author: Ryan Guzman

2964.quote: As I approached my 95th birthday, I was burdened to write a book that addressed the epidemic of 'easy believism.' There is a mindset today that if people believe in God and do good works, they are going to Heaven.
2964.author: Billy Graham

2965.quote: I started running around my 30th birthday. I wanted to lose weight; I didn't anticipate the serenity. Being in motion, suddenly my body was busy and so my head could work out some issues I had swept under a carpet of wine and cheese. Good therapy, that's a good run.
2965.author: Michael Weatherly

2966.quote: I went to a rare live Van Dyke show and met him there. And then he came to a show of mine and we spoke back stage. The third time was at Brian Wilson's birthday party.
2966.author: Matthew Sweet

2967.quote: For the youth, the indignation of most things will just surge as each birthday passes.
2967.author: Chris Evans

2968.quote: I've got more than 600 pairs of Ray-Ban sunglasses, from 1950s originals to newer models. I have them on the wall like opticians do so I can pick out a pair that goes with my outfit. I had around 30 pairs, then my husband Rainer started getting them for me as birthday and Christmas gifts.
2968.author: Suzi Quatro

2969.quote: I often imagine what it would be like if my father were still here to mark his 100th birthday, if Alzheimer's hadn't clawed away years, possibilities, hopes. What would he think of all the commemorations and celebrations?
2969.author: Patti Davis

2970.quote: Most of us have fond memories of food from our childhood. Whether it was our mom's homemade lasagna or a memorable chocolate birthday cake, food has a way of transporting us back to the past.
2970.author: Homaro Cantu

2971.quote: Friends and family do not believe you write fiction. They truly believe that every word you write is either autobiographical or based on them. I once had a character say that she never wanted to be invited to another children's birthday party, and I never received another children's birthday party invitation ever again.
2971.author: Liane Moriarty

2972.quote: Success is like reaching an important birthday and finding you're exactly the same.
2972.author: Audrey Hepburn

2973.quote: I'd be happy to live till 80 as long as I was comfortable and in good health. Mind you, ask me again on the eve of my 80th birthday. Even so, I hope we don't all start living to be 120. I'm not sure I'd cope with another 60 years.
2973.author: Bonnie Tyler

2974.quote: I just had my 30th birthday and we went turkey shooting. It's what I wanted to do, so we went.
2974.author: Kelly Clarkson

2975.quote: I tried to bake a cake for my mother's birthday - it took me four hours. It was terrible, and I cried for three days.
2975.author: Rachael Ray

2976.quote: I've got some incredible fans actually - so loyal and they make me birthday cards and Christmas cards. I got this package of poems and artwork based around the songs. They've got this thing called 'Floetry' where they all have to put in artwork. They've set up their own competitions and stuff which is kind of amazing.
2976.author: Florence Welch

2977.quote: Motorcycle riding has been a passion of mine since my 20th birthday, and as a proud member of the American Motorcyclist Association and the Harley Owners Group, I can attest that responsible riding has many unique recreational benefits for millions of Americans.
2977.author: Tim Walberg

2978.quote: If we celebrate Martin Luther King Jr.'s birthday at a time of presidential inaugurals, this is thanks to Ronald Reagan who created the holiday, and not to the Democratic Congress of the Carter years, which rejected it.
2978.author: David Horowitz

2979.quote: Fourth of July. My birthday is July first, and my best friend's birthday is July fifth, so it's always been a favorite holiday. It's all about having a cooler full of sodas, hot dogs, and just hanging out and shooting off firecrackers, being low-key, watching the fireworks.
2979.author: Hilarie Burton

2980.quote: With my wife I don't get no respect. I made a toast on her birthday to 'the best woman a man ever had.' The waiter joined me.
2980.author: Rodney Dangerfield

2981.quote: You know, maybe I was just born in the wrong time, but I love all things romantic. Puffy understands that. For my last birthday, he covered my hotel room floor with rose petals and had flowers and candles all over the room.
2981.author: Jennifer Lopez

2982.quote: You always get a special kick on opening day, no matter how many you go through. You look forward to it like a birthday party when you're a kid. You think something wonderful is going to happen.
2982.author: Joe DiMaggio

2983.quote: Since graduation, I have measured time in 4-by-5-inch pieces of paper, four days on the left and three on the right. Every social engagement, interview, reading, flight, doctor's appointment, birthday and dry-cleaning reminder has been handwritten between metal loops.
2983.author: Sloane Crosley

2984.quote: The thrill of performing - that's something that hasn't changed for me. That simultaneous joy of creating something and sharing it with an audience - it's the same now as it was then, when it was just my cousins' birthday party.
2984.author: Steve Buscemi

2985.quote: I'm really not the party type. I more like to have friends over at the house and chill. I've never been the super party type. But for the 18th birthday, you got to party. And then 21 is going to be even bigger.
2985.author: Jacob Latimore

2986.quote: We invest less in our friendships and expect more of friends than any other relationship. We spend days working out where to book for a romantic dinner, weeks wondering how to celebrate a partner or parent's birthday, and seconds forgetting a friend's important anniversary.
2986.author: Mariella Frostrup

2987.quote: As a kid, I always went to therapists; the first time was when my parents were separated on my sixth birthday, then on and off since then.
2987.author: Pete Wentz

2988.quote: I got my first camera when I was 21 - my boyfriend gave it to me for my birthday - but at that point politics was my life, and I viewed the camera as a tool for expressing my political beliefs rather than as an art medium.
2988.author: Carrie Mae Weems

2989.quote: I gave a funny speech at my wife's birthday party, and I'm thinking, 'Hey, I've still got it.'
2989.author: Larry David

2990.quote: The only show my mother could afford to take me to when I was growing up was 'Cats', for my birthday.
2990.author: Tammy Blanchard

2991.quote: My first paying job might have been doing a play, actually. My mom paid me to dress up as a flounder at my sister's 'Little Mermaid' - themed birthday party when I was little.
2991.author: Paul Dano

2992.quote: I want a chainsaw very badly, because I think cutting down a tree would be unbelievably satisfying. I have asked for a chainsaw for my birthday, but I think I'll probably be given jewelry instead.
2992.author: Susan Orlean

2993.quote: I had been offered a Hollywood contract before my 18th birthday. It gave me the spark I needed.
2993.author: Gene Tierney

2994.quote: Every five years, I like to do a big birthday party. I had my 45th birthday with 75 friends in Marrakesh, Morocco.
2994.author: Chip Conley

2995.quote: With a recent birthday, I've been acting now for twenty years.
2995.author: Thayer David

2996.quote: Robert Duvall saw me playing at a restaurant in Louisiana and invited me to be an extra in his movie 'The Apostle.' He gave me a guitar for my sixth birthday, and I thought that was the coolest thing in the world.
2996.author: Hunter Hayes

2997.quote: I grew up doing all that stuff because I was obsessed with the '50s. I had sock hops for birthday parties. So I've always done The Twist and stuff. It was pretty natural and, with my parents doing it all the time, I'd just copy them. Not very pretty.
2997.author: Brittany Snow

2998.quote: I worked at an ice cream parlor called Chadwicks. We wore old-timey outfits and had to bang a drum, play a kazoo, and sing 'Happy Birthday' to people while giving them free birthday sundaes. Lots of ice cream scooping and $1 tips.
2998.author: Amy Poehler

2999.quote: Birthday Alarm was a very simple site based on being reminded of your friends' birthdays.
2999.author: Michael Birch

3000.quote: One of the shocks of a 50th birthday is realizing the fundamental fact that your youth is irrevocably over.
3000.author: Marianne Williamson

3001.quote: If there's one thing I really want for my birthday, that is for the mining company not to mine my daddy's reserve.
3001.author: Bindi Irwin

3002.quote: My parents were dishonest people. If it was my birthday, I knew my mother took me to the K-Mart and she stole my toy. She'd put it in the shopping cart and we'd walk out. I was raised with that.
3002.author: Vincent Gallo

3003.quote: If you've been running a business for 38 years, you're approaching your 66th birthday, you've never owed a man a penny or done anyone any grievance in your life, and you feel hard done-by and try to protect yourself and your family, but go to prison, well if that's the society we're living in, I'm happy to accept that.
3003.author: Sean Quinn

3004.quote: And I was very shy as a kid; if you sang me 'Happy Birthday,' I would cry. Quite shy. So the idea of being an actor, much less a model, was just out of this world.
3004.author: Cody Horn

3005.quote: I had arranged a birthday party for him and my children, who are all Aquarians. Instead, we got married. I ran out of excuses. It was just us and my children.
3005.author: Diane von Furstenberg

3006.quote: All my favorite stars, my family and my friends are here. I'm having the happiest birthday that an 18-year-old girl could ever have.
3006.author: Brandy Norwood

3007.quote: When Oscar Niemeyer died on December 5, 2012, ten days before his 105th birthday, he was universally regarded as the very last of the twentieth century's major architectural masters, an astonishing survivor whose most famous accomplishment, Brasilia, was the climactic episode of utopian High Modern urbanism.
3007.author: Martin Filler

3008.quote: Why, on my mother's birthday, am I thinking about 'Father Knows Best?' At our house, mother knew best at least as often as father did, but then the title of the old sitcom, a homogenized portrait of American family life, was meant to be slightly sardonic.
3008.author: Tom Shales

3009.quote: Ask any teenage girl to describe her perfect bedroom, and you'll get answers like 'a room with a private phone line, a place to hang out with friends, and for it to be way-cool and funky.' Ask parents the same question, and 'a locked door that opens on their 21st birthday' might top the list!
3009.author: Candice Olson

3010.quote: All I watch is the Food Network. I took a cheesemaking class a few weeks ago, and I told my family and friends to only get me kitchen stuff on my birthday. I'm into every kind of cookbook and anything by Anthony Bourdain. I'd love to own a restaurant if I could find the right chef.
3010.author: Jesse McCartney

3011.quote: For my 11th birthday, I asked to be adopted.
3011.author: Kaui Hart Hemmings

3012.quote: I have a strong memory of the day I was told that my father had a weak heart and that he had to go to the hospital. He died when I was nine years old on the same day that Franklin Roosevelt died; it was his 45th birthday.
3012.author: Alan J. Heeger

3013.quote: I'm a Virgo and I'm more - I don't want to say 'negative' - but I'm the girl who thinks no one's coming to my birthday party, no one's buying my clothes, no one's reading my book, no one's watching my show - that's just how I think.
3013.author: Rachel Zoe

3014.quote: My father was one of the fortunate wartime servicemen: he made a full recovery from his injuries, was promoted to captain, survived the war, had a satisfying career as a colonial officer and, eventually, died in February 2002, a month before his 85th birthday.
3014.author: Michael Ashcroft

3015.quote: I've died so many times. I'm 65. On my 40th birthday, my girlfriend gave me a reel with ways I had died, whether it was by knife, or electrocution or drowning or being thrown off a building or whatever it might have been. I've died a lot of times!
3015.author: Jonathan Banks

3016.quote: Interventions are really emotionally exhausting and I would never ever want to have one. In the same way, I would never want to have a surprise birthday party. That would be horrible.
3016.author: Margaret Cho

3017.quote: I like working on my birthday, so I always do.
3017.author: Abhishek Bachchan

3018.quote: I was very aware of Jeff Buckley. My brother actually bought me The Mamas And The Papas and Jeff Buckley for my birthday when I was in my early teens.
3018.author: Imogen Poots

3019.quote: I saw Farrah Fawcett originally when she and her boyfriend, Lee Majors, came over to my house for a birthday party that I was having for my ex-wife, Leigh Taylor-Young.
3019.author: Ryan O'Neal

3020.quote: A true nature is a gloomy monolith, sort of like that old black rotary phone that I had to sing 'Happy Birthday' to Grandpa on. But novelists, damn us, still need true natures - so we can give them to our protagonists. And so readers can vaguely predict how they'll behave when we trap them in 'situations' that they can't IM their way out of.
3020.author: Walter Kirn

3021.quote: I think the best thing about my job is that I have my life documented, which not many people get to have. They have a photo here and there and maybe some video footage from a birthday. My kids will be able to see me growing up.
3021.author: Kirsten Dunst

3022.quote: I saw a man killed in front of my eyes just before my eighth birthday.
3022.author: Peter O'Toole

3023.quote: I guess I could say I'm an actor, which I am, but that sounds like I'm putting down being a movie star, which, let's face it, is what I've become to many people. For myself, I'm a guy who was very insecure from about age 14 until the day I hit my 30th birthday.
3023.author: Dennis Quaid

3024.quote: Growing up, my birthday was always Confederate Memorial Day. It helped to create this profound sense of awareness about the Civil War and the 100 years between the Civil War and the civil rights movement and my parents' then-illegal and interracial marriage.
3024.author: Natasha Trethewey

3025.quote: As I approach my 88th birthday, it's become apparent to me that my eyes and ears, among other appurtenances, aren't quite what they used to be. The prospect of long flights to wherever in search of whatever are not quite as appealing.
3025.author: Mike Wallace

3026.quote: I filed a brief as a friend of the court in the U. of Michigan to keep affirmative action at the U. of Michigan, which I attended the law school. And I was one of the original sponsors of making the Martin Luther King birthday a federal holiday.
3026.author: Dick Gephardt

3027.quote: My parents screened 'Willy Wonka & the Chocolate Factory' for my 6th birthday, and I became fascinated by the idea of living in a candy land with chocolate rivers and lollipop trees.
3027.author: Dylan Lauren

3028.quote: I hate birthdays. I thought that I only hated my own birthday, and then I realized that I hate my children's birthdays too.
3028.author: Samantha Bee

3029.quote: I lost twins at 14 weeks, and I had to have an D and C on my birthday.
3029.author: Amy Weber

3030.quote: I love mayonnaise. Every birthday when I was a kid I'd go to Black Angus and just dip my burger in mayo.
3030.author: Blake Anderson

3031.quote: I'm one of those people who had Christmas and my birthday always combined, and generally, my birthday was pretty much ignored. But my parents are always good about making some kind of special effort to make me feel like I also have a birthday that exists.
3031.author: Noel Wells

3032.quote: The first guitar I ever got was for my 13th birthday.
3032.author: Rick Springfield

3033.quote: I get letters constantly from all over the world, telephone calls from America, Brazil, Australia, all over, especially on my birthday. A family? I have a huge international family. That's all I need.
3033.author: Renata Tebaldi

3034.quote: I've never really made a big deal out of my birthday.
3034.author: Nikki Reed

3035.quote: As I approached my 18th birthday and prepared to enter military service in World War II, I was recommended to receive the Melchizedek Priesthood.
3035.author: Thomas S. Monson

3036.quote: I was in my mid-teens when someone gave me a copy of 'Pears Encyclopaedia of Myth and Legends' as a birthday present. It sat on my shelves for many months before I looked at it. When I did, I couldn't stop reading it.
3036.author: Tariq Ali

3037.quote: I remember when I was working at Sprint, I'd work on my birthday, New Year's Day, and even Christmas Eve. I'm just used to working on my birthday, so I'll be celebrating it afterward.
3037.author: Prince Royce

3038.quote: I have had fans make me the big picture collages of the photo books; I have had fans send me birthday cakes... sing to me on my voicemail. I have had fans flash me. I have had older fans give me their bras and underwear onstage.
3038.author: Sean Combs

3039.quote: Citizens, thank you for all your birthday wishes. I am 88 years old today and still lucky to live in the greatest city in the world.
3039.author: Ed Koch

3040.quote: I often go to bed in my birthday suit. But I like teddies and cute little undies that match. I like a sexy bra and panty set, or little shorts.
3040.author: Queen Latifah

3041.quote: I trained to be a priest - started to. I went to seminary school when I was 11. I wanted to be a priest, but when they told me I could never have sex, not even on my birthday, I changed my mind.
3041.author: Johnny Vegas

3042.quote: You don't choose your family. They are God's gift to you, as you are to them.
3042.author: Desmond Tutu

3043.quote: If a country is to be corruption free and become a nation of beautiful minds, I strongly feel there are three key societal members who can make a difference. They are the father, the mother and the teacher.
3043.author: A. P. J. Abdul Kalam

3044.quote: The love of family and the admiration of friends is much more important than wealth and privilege.
3044.author: Charles Kuralt

3045.quote: Family is not an important thing. It's everything.
3045.author: Michael J. Fox

3046.quote: The bond that links your true family is not one of blood, but of respect and joy in each other's life.
3046.author: Richard Bach

3047.quote: The family is one of nature's masterpieces.
3047.author: George Santayana

3048.quote: For there is no friend like a sister in calm or stormy weather; To cheer one on the tedious way, to fetch one if one goes astray, to lift one if one totters down, to strengthen whilst one stands.
3048.author: Christina Rossetti

3049.quote: Family means no one gets left behind or forgotten.
3049.author: David Ogden Stiers

3050.quote: I'm thankful to God for having a family that's been there for me. He's been there from the time I was a child to even now with my family helping with my little boy. It's worth more than words could ever describe. That's one of the ways I've been able to stay grounded is thanks to family and God.
3050.author: Ashton Shepherd

3051.quote: My family is my strength and my weakness.
3051.author: Aishwarya Rai Bachchan

3052.quote: A happy family is but an earlier heaven.
3052.author: George Bernard Shaw

3053.quote: The only rock I know that stays steady, the only institution I know that works, is the family.
3053.author: Lee Iacocca

3054.quote: Sister is probably the most competitive relationship within the family, but once the sisters are grown, it becomes the strongest relationship.
3054.author: Margaret Mead

3055.quote: I think togetherness is a very important ingredient to family life.
3055.author: Barbara Bush

3056.quote: To us, family means putting your arms around each other and being there.
3056.author: Barbara Bush

3057.quote: I'll never stop dreaming that one day we can be a real family, together, all of us laughing and talking, loving and understanding, not looking at the past but only to the future.
3057.author: LaToya Jackson

3058.quote: Feelings of worth can flourish only in an atmosphere where individual differences are appreciated, mistakes are tolerated, communication is open, and rules are flexible - the kind of atmosphere that is found in a nurturing family.
3058.author: Virginia Satir

3059.quote: Your children are not your children. They are the sons and daughters of Life's longing for itself. They came through you but not from you and though they are with you yet they belong not to you.
3059.author: Khalil Gibran

3060.quote: Family is the most important thing in the world.
3060.author: Princess Diana

3061.quote: In every conceivable manner, the family is link to our past, bridge to our future.
3061.author: Alex Haley

3062.quote: A home with a loving and loyal husband and wife is the supreme setting in which children can be reared in love and righteousness and in which the spiritual and physical needs of children can be met.
3062.author: David A. Bednar

3063.quote: I've always put my family first and that's just the way it is.
3063.author: Jamie Lee Curtis

3064.quote: Children are the keys of paradise.
3064.author: Eric Hoffer

3065.quote: There's nothing I value more than the closeness of friends and family, a smile as I pass someone on the street.
3065.author: Willie Stargell

3066.quote: Family quarrels are bitter things. They don't go according to any rules. They're not like aches or wounds, they're more like splits in the skin that won't heal because there's not enough material.
3066.author: F. Scott Fitzgerald

3067.quote: The great danger for family life, in the midst of any society whose idols are pleasure, comfort and independence, lies in the fact that people close their hearts and become selfish.
3067.author: Pope John Paul II

3068.quote: I have a family to support. And I'm not always going to be doing exactly what I want to do.
3068.author: Patrick Warburton

3069.quote: When trouble comes, it's your family that supports you.
3069.author: Guy Lafleur

3070.quote: A man should never neglect his family for business.
3070.author: Walt Disney

3071.quote: We love to be with our family and friends and I can tell you that lots of eating will be involved.
3071.author: Julia Barr

3072.quote: Pray in your family daily, that yours may be in the number of the families who call upon God.
3072.author: Christopher Love

3073.quote: I have a great family, I live an amazing life.
3073.author: John Oates

3074.quote: People are pretty forgiving when it comes to other people's families. The only family that ever horrifies you is your own.
3074.author: Douglas Coupland

3075.quote: Both within the family and without, our sisters hold up our mirrors: our images of who we are and of who we can dare to be.
3075.author: Elizabeth Fishel

3076.quote: One of the things that binds us as a family is a shared sense of humor.
3076.author: Ralph Fiennes

3077.quote: A family can develop only with a loving woman as its center.
3077.author: Karl Wilhelm Friedrich Schlegel

3078.quote: I believe the world is one big family, and we need to help each other.
3078.author: Jet Li

3079.quote: I love children and I get along with them great. It's just that I believe if you're going to be a parent, there has to be something inside you that says, 'I want a family.' I don't feel that sense of urgency.
3079.author: George Clooney

3080.quote: I have frequently been questioned, especially by women, of how I could reconcile family life with a scientific career. Well, it has not been easy.
3080.author: Marie Curie

3081.quote: You have to defend your honor. And your family.
3081.author: Suzanne Vega

3082.quote: Cherish your human connections - your relationships with friends and family.
3082.author: Barbara Bush

3083.quote: I woke up one morning thinking about wolves and realized that wolf packs function as families. Everyone has a role, and if you act within the parameters of your role, the whole pack succeeds, and when that falls apart, so does the pack.
3083.author: Jodi Picoult

3084.quote: The family is the nucleus of civilization.
3084.author: Will Durant

3085.quote: The family is the test of freedom; because the family is the only thing that the free man makes for himself and by himself.
3085.author: Gilbert K. Chesterton

3086.quote: When you have a godly husband, a godly wife, children who respect their parents and who are loved by their parents, who provide for those children their physical and spiritual and material needs, lovingly, you have the ideal unit.
3086.author: Jerry Falwell

3087.quote: The one thing that kept our family together was the music. The only thing that our family would share emotionally was to have our dad cry over something the kids did with music.
3087.author: Dennis Wilson

3088.quote: For me, nothing has ever taken precedence over being a mother and having a family and a home.
3088.author: Jessica Lange

3089.quote: There is no such thing as fun for the whole family.
3089.author: Jerry Seinfeld

3090.quote: My life comes down to three moments: the death of my father, meeting my husband, and the birth of my daughter. Everything I did previous to that just doesn't seem to add up to very much.
3090.author: Gwyneth Paltrow

3091.quote: Women's natural role is to be a pillar of the family.
3091.author: Grace Kelly

3092.quote: I would rather start a family than finish one.
3092.author: Don Marquis

3093.quote: Happy or unhappy, families are all mysterious. We have only to imagine how differently we would be described - and will be, after our deaths - by each of the family members who believe they know us.
3093.author: Gloria Steinem

3094.quote: You don't have to give birth to someone to have a family.
3094.author: Sandra Bullock

3095.quote: A family is a place where principles are hammered and honed on the anvil of everyday living.
3095.author: Charles R. Swindoll

3096.quote: When I was younger, my family would go camping and fishing on our ranches. My dad loves being around all kinds of animals. He's the one who got me to be a really big animal lover.
3096.author: Paris Hilton

3097.quote: The attempt to redefine the family as a purely voluntary arrangement grows out of the modern delusion that people can keep all their options open all the time.
3097.author: Christopher Lasch

3098.quote: What must it be like for a little boy to read that daddy never loved mummy?
3098.author: Princess Diana

3099.quote: The children have been a wonderful gift to me, and I'm thankful to have once again seen our world through their eyes. They restore my faith in the family's future.
3099.author: Jackie Kennedy

3100.quote: We'll sort of get over the marriage first and then maybe look at the kids. But obviously we want a family so we'll have to start thinking about that.
3100.author: Prince William

3101.quote: One's family is the most important thing in life. I look at it this way: One of these days I'll be over in a hospital somewhere with four walls around me. And the only people who'll be with me will be my family.
3101.author: Robert Byrd

3102.quote: My family was my guide to my reality.
3102.author: Haywood Nelson

3103.quote: Little children are still the symbol of the eternal marriage between love and duty.
3103.author: George Eliot

3104.quote: Maybe there is no actual place called hell. Maybe hell is just having to listen to our grandparents breathe through their noses when they're eating sandwiches.
3104.author: Jim Carrey

3105.quote: He who is overly attached to his family members experiences fear and sorrow, for the root of all grief is attachment. Thus one should discard attachment to be happy.
3105.author: Chanakya

3106.quote: I love cooking for myself and cooking for my family.
3106.author: Al Roker

3107.quote: I've given it my all. I've done my best. Now, I'm ready with my family to begin the next phase of our lives.
3107.author: Richard M. Daley

3108.quote: All of us grow up in particular realities - a home, family, a clan, a small town, a neighborhood. Depending upon how we're brought up, we are either deeply aware of the particular reading of reality into which we are born, or we are peripherally aware of it.
3108.author: Chaim Potok

3109.quote: Some of the most important conversations I've ever had occurred at my family's dinner table.
3109.author: Bob Ehrlich

3110.quote: Like all my family and class, I considered it a sign of weakness to show affection; to have been caught kissing my mother would have been a disgrace, and to have shown affection for my father would have been a disaster.
3110.author: Agnes Smedley

3111.quote: I stay in tune with my family and God.
3111.author: Regina King

3112.quote: I come from that society and there is a common thread, specifically family values - the idea that you do anything for your family, and the unconditional love for one's children.
3112.author: Ednita Nazario

3113.quote: The family you come from isn't as important as the family you're going to have.
3113.author: Ring Lardner

3115.quote: Dignity is not negotiable. Dignity is the honor of the family.
3115.author: Vartan Gregorian

3116.quote: The other night I ate at a real nice family restaurant. Every table had an argument going.
3116.author: George Carlin

3117.quote: Tennis just a game, family is forever.
3117.author: Serena Williams

3118.quote: The greatest thing in family life is to take a hint when a hint is intended-and not to take a hint when a hint isn't intended.
3118.author: Robert Frost

3119.quote: The foundation of family - that's where it all begins for me.
3119.author: Faith Hill

3120.quote: Also, my mom and family are very important to me and I know that this is not expected.
3120.author: Christina Milian

3121.quote: Without a family, man, alone in the world, trembles with the cold.
3121.author: Andre Maurois

3122.quote: If one is desperate for love, I suggest looking at one's friends and family and see if love is all around. If not, get a new set of friends, a new family.
3122.author: Jasmine Guy

3123.quote: A family is a risky venture, because the greater the love, the greater the loss... That's the trade-off. But I'll take it all.
3123.author: Brad Pitt

3124.quote: Give a little love to a child, and you get a great deal back.
3124.author: John Ruskin

3125.quote: I am the baby in the family, and I always will be. I am actually very happy to have that position. But I still get teased. I don't mind that.
3125.author: Janet Jackson

3126.quote: My kids give me the balance to live right.
3126.author: Celine Dion

3127.quote: Happy is said to be the family which can eat onions together. They are, for the time being, separate, from the world, and have a harmony of aspiration.
3127.author: Charles Dudley Warner

3128.quote: When I remember my family, I always remember their backs. They were always indignantly leaving places.
3128.author: John Cheever

3129.quote: I'm pretty much a good Catholic girl at heart and I believe in family. I also have a basic belief that God takes care of me. I believe in prayer, even though I'm not that religious. I just have that foundation from my family. I mean when you think that you're just a human being and one of God's creatures, you can't take anything that seriously.
3129.author: Catherine O'Hara

3130.quote: I grew up in a very religious family. I could read the Qu'ran easily at the age of five.
3130.author: Akhmad Kadyrov

3131.quote: Family life itself, that safest, most traditional, most approved of female choices, is not a sanctuary: It is, perpetually, a dangerous place.
3131.author: Margaret Drabble

3132.quote: We went to church every Sunday. When I was a kid, the only time I sang was around my family.
3132.author: Darius Rucker

3133.quote: My whole damn family was nice. I don't think I've imagined it. It's true. Maybe it has to do with being brought up as Christian Scientists. Half of my relatives were Readers or Practitioners in the church.
3133.author: Henry Fonda

3134.quote: Once I got married and had kids, I moved away from romantic roles, because it seemed wrong to have my 3-year-old wondering why Daddy was kissing someone else.
3134.author: Chevy Chase

3135.quote: I grew up in a family in which political issues were often discussed, and debated intensely.
3135.author: Joseph Stiglitz

3136.quote: As a general thing, when a woman wears the pants in a family, she has a good right to them.
3136.author: Josh Billings

3137.quote: I find the family the most mysterious and fascinating institution in the world.
3137.author: Amos Oz

3138.quote: It takes a lot of work to put together a marriage, to put together a family and a home.
3138.author: Elizabeth Edwards

3139.quote: I am the family face; flesh perishes, I live on.
3139.author: Thomas Hardy

3140.quote: I don't have to look up my family tree, because I know that I'm the sap.
3140.author: Fred Allen

3141.quote: I don't think anyone has a normal family.
3141.author: Edward Furlong

3142.quote: When you start about family, about lineage and ancestry, you are talking about every person on earth.
3142.author: Alex Haley

3143.quote: I would love a family. I'm at the age where the wish for a child gets stronger. But who knows.
3143.author: Cameron Diaz

3144.quote: Insanity runs in my family. It practically gallops.
3144.author: Cary Grant

3145.quote: Spend some time this weekend on home improvement; improve your attitude toward your family.
3145.author: Bo Bennett

3146.quote: I was born into the most remarkable and eccentric family I could possibly have hoped for.
3146.author: Maureen O'Hara

3147.quote: My family comes first. Maybe that's what makes me different from other guys.
3147.author: Bobby Darin

3148.quote: You leave home to seek your fortune and, when you get it, you go home and share it with your family.
3148.author: Anita Baker

3149.quote: I have a lot of very close girlfriends and sisters - I'm from an all female family. My father often quips that even the cat was neutered!
3149.author: Shirley Manson

3150.quote: I love all my fam. I have quite possibly the best dad, mom, and sister in the world.
3150.author: Ryan Eggold

3151.quote: The family is the first essential cell of human society.
3151.author: Pope John XXIII

3152.quote: God did not intend the human family to be wafted to heaven on flowery beds of ease.
3152.author: Frank Knox

3153.quote: I realized my family was funny, because nobody ever wanted to leave our house.
3153.author: Anthony Anderson

3154.quote: At a certain point I'm going to want to have a family.
3154.author: Gwen Stefani

3155.quote: My father used to play with my brother and me in the yard. Mother would come out and say, 'You're tearing up the grass'; 'We're not raising grass,' Dad would reply. 'We're raising boys.'
3155.author: Harmon Killebrew

3156.quote: I am tortured when I am away from my family, from my children. I am horribly guilt-ridden.
3156.author: Jessica Lange

3157.quote: If I had no family, my wife and I would lead a much more romantic and nomadic existence.
3157.author: David McCallum

3158.quote: It's not that our family has no taste, it's just that our family's taste is inconsistent.
3158.author: Dave Eggers

3159.quote: I never did quite fit the glamour mode. It is life with my husband and family that is my high now.
3159.author: Patty Duke

3160.quote: First and foremost comes my family and my life with Brad. We have so much joy in raising our children and teaching them about the world that nothing really compares to that.
3160.author: Angelina Jolie

3161.quote: If we abandon marriage, we abandon the family.
3161.author: Michael Enzi

3162.quote: Rarely do members of the same family grow up under the same roof.
3162.author: Richard Bach

3163.quote: I don't know if I believe in marriage. I believe in family, love and children.
3163.author: Penelope Cruz

3164.quote: A woman can plan when to have her family and how to support a family.
3164.author: Kathleen Turner

3165.quote: When I'm ready, I plan to adopt. I still believe in family.
3165.author: LaToya Jackson

3166.quote: Our family life was certainly not intellectual.
3166.author: Douglass North

3167.quote: A woman should be home with the children, building that home and making sure there's a secure family atmosphere.
3167.author: Mel Gibson

3168.quote: It's very strange that most people don't care if their knowledge of their family history only goes back three generations.
3168.author: Douglas Coupland

3169.quote: America cannot continue to lead the family of nations around the world if we suffer the collapse of the family here at home.
3169.author: Mitt Romney

3170.quote: A woman can take care of the family. It takes a man to provide structure, to provide stability.
3170.author: Tom DeLay

3171.quote: Parents need all the help they can get. The strongest as well as the most fragile family requires a vital network of social supports.
3171.author: Bernice Weissbourd

3172.quote: Having family responsibilities and concerns just has to make you a more understanding person.
3172.author: Sandra Day O'Connor

3173.quote: The left dismisses talk about the collapse of family life and talks instead about the emergence of the growing new diversity of family types.
3173.author: Christopher Lasch

3174.quote: Whatever else is unsure in this stinking dunghill of a world a mother's love is not.
3174.author: James Joyce

3175.quote: My family background was deeply Christian.
3175.author: Abbe Pierre

3176.quote: For all of those willing to help me start a family, I am flattered. I will let you know when I need your help.
3176.author: Paula Abdul

3177.quote: Family, nature and health all go together.
3177.author: Olivia Newton-John

3178.quote: There are things that you cannot talk to your mother and father about, there are things that you cannot talk to your children about.
3178.author: Shirley Knight

3179.quote: My family is more important than my party.
3179.author: Zell Miller

3180.quote: I'm not much of a family man. I'm just not that into it. I love kids, I adore them, but I don't want to live my life for them.
3180.author: Sting

3181.quote: It is extraordinary that when you are acquainted with a whole family you can forget about them.
3181.author: Gertrude Stein

3182.quote: Dad kept us out of school, but school comes and goes. Family is forever.
3182.author: Charlie Sheen

3183.quote: I live quietly at home among my family and friends.
3183.author: Antonio Tabucchi

3184.quote: I have these visions of myself being thirty, thirty-five, forty having a family.
3184.author: Nastassja Kinski

3185.quote: The joke in our family is that we can cry reading the phone book.
3185.author: Ron Reagan

3186.quote: Make a Goal Box, a chart of positive daily contact with a family when you are working with them.
3186.author: Richard G. Scott

3187.quote: The most difficult is the first family, to bring someone out of the world.
3187.author: Richard G. Scott

3188.quote: To enjoy good health, to bring true happiness to one's family, to bring peace to all, one must first discipline and control one's own mind. If a man can control his mind he can find the way to Enlightenment, and all wisdom and virtue will naturally come to him.
3188.author: Buddha

3189.quote: Knowledge is power. Information is liberating. Education is the premise of progress, in every society, in every family.
3189.author: Kofi Annan

3190.quote: Positive feelings come from being honest about yourself and accepting your personality, and physical characteristics, warts and all; and, from belonging to a family that accepts you without question.
3190.author: Willard Scott

3191.quote: At the end of the day, life is about being happy being who you are, and I feel like we are so blessed to have the support system and the best family to really just support each other no matter what we're going through.
3191.author: Kim Kardashian

3192.quote: Think about what people are doing on Facebook today. They're keeping up with their friends and family, but they're also building an image and identity for themselves, which in a sense is their brand. They're connecting with the audience that they want to connect to. It's almost a disadvantage if you're not on it now.
3192.author: Mark Zuckerberg

3193.quote: Christmas is the perfect time to celebrate the love of God and family and to create memories that will last forever. Jesus is God's perfect, indescribable gift. The amazing thing is that not only are we able to receive this gift, but we are able to share it with others on Christmas and every other day of the year.
3193.author: Joel Osteen

3194.quote: I am blessed to have so many great things in my life - family, friends and God. All will be in my thoughts daily.
3194.author: Lil' Kim

3195.quote: I looked up my family tree and found out I was the sap.
3195.author: Rodney Dangerfield

3196.quote: My best friend is the most important girl, outside of family, to me. I met her when I went to college and we bonded immediately. I'd do anything for her at any time. We phone each other every day.
3196.author: Dawn French

3197.quote: Every child should have a caring adult in their lives. And that's not always a biological parent or family member. It may be a friend or neighbor. Often times it is a teacher.
3197.author: Joe Manchin

3198.quote: I love spending time with my friends and family. The simplest things in life give me the most pleasure: cooking a good meal, enjoying my friends.
3198.author: Cindy Morgan

3199.quote: A real man loves his wife, and places his family as the most important thing in life. Nothing has brought me more peace and content in life than simply being a good husband and father.
3199.author: Frank Abagnale

3200.quote: I come from a family where gravy is considered a beverage.
3200.author: Erma Bombeck

3201.quote: The death penalty is ineffective as a deterrent, and the appeals process is expensive and cruel to the surviving family members.
3201.author: Martin O'Malley

3202.quote: Social media websites are no longer performing an envisaged function of creating a positive communication link among friends, family and professionals. It is a veritable battleground, where insults fly from the human quiver, damaging lives, destroying self-esteem and a person's sense of self-worth.
3202.author: Anthony Carmona

3203.quote: Music became a healer for me. And I learned to listen with all my being. I found that it could wipe away all the emotions of fear and confusion relating to my family.
3203.author: Eric Clapton

3204.quote: I had a really wonderful upbringing. We were a tight family. It was wonderful to grow up with so many siblings. We were all just a year or two apart, and we were always so supportive of each other. I learned everything from my older brother and sister and taught it to my younger sisters.
3204.author: Joaquin Phoenix

3205.quote: I have a wonderful shelter, which is my family. I have a wonderful relationship with my brother and sister; this makes me feel that I know always where I belong.
3205.author: Jose Carreras

3206.quote: We were a family that made our Halloween costumes. Or, more accurately, my mother made them. She took no suggestions or advice. Halloween costumes were her territory. She was the brain behind my brother's winning girl costume, stuffing her own bra with newspapers for him to wear under a cashmere sweater and smearing red lipstick on his lips.
3206.author: Ann Hood

3207.quote: Many times, the decisions we make affect and hurt your closest friends and family the most. I have a lot of regrets in that regard. But God has forgiven me, which I am very thankful for. It has enabled me to forgive myself and move forward one day at a time.
3207.author: Lex Luger

3208.quote: My experiences in life are getting bigger and better. The more stuff I do, the more stuff I talk about - having kids, traveling, going through relationship problems, dealing with things in my own family. All that stuff builds character.
3208.author: Kevin Hart

3209.quote: You cannot have maternal health without reproductive health. And reproductive health includes contraception and family planning and access to legal, safe abortion.
3209.author: Hillary Clinton

3210.quote: When the peace treaty is signed, the war isn't over for the veterans, or the family. It's just starting.
3210.author: Karl Marlantes

3211.quote: My family and friends were definitely the key to my recovery. One thing that I do suggest is that anyone dealing with a life-threatening illness like cancer choose a point person for people to call to find out how you are doing - a sister, brother, mother, father, daughter, son, or close friend.
3211.author: Olivia Newton-John

3212.quote: As the family goes, so goes the nation and so goes the whole world in which we live.
3212.author: Pope John Paul II

3213.quote: I come from the countryside. I come from a bunch of horticulture family members. My best friend was a farmer's boy.
3213.author: Luke Evans

3214.quote: Festivals are fun for kids, fun for parents and offer a welcome break from the stresses of the nuclear family. The sheer quantities of people make life easier: loads of adults for the adults to talk to and loads of kids for the kids to play with.
3214.author: Tom Hodgkinson

3215.quote: Be strong, believe in freedom and in God, love yourself, understand your sexuality, have a sense of humor, masturbate, don't judge people by their religion, color or sexual habits, love life and your family.
3215.author: Madonna Ciccone

3216.quote: Happiness is having a large, loving, caring, close-knit family in another city.
3216.author: George Burns

3217.quote: Let us remember we are all part of one American family. We are united in common values, and that includes belief in equality under the law, basic respect for public order, and the right of peaceful protest.
3217.author: Barack Obama

3218.quote: Clearly older women and especially older women who have led an active life or elder women who successfully maneuver through their own family life have so much to teach us about sharing, patience, and wisdom.
3218.author: Alice Walker

3219.quote: I liked St. Louis, when they were in the American League, because that was going home. I had all my family and friends there.
3219.author: Yogi Berra

3220.quote: Everyone feels like family and I am back in the city that I love.
3220.author: Chris Noth

3221.quote: My mom has made it possible for me to be who I am. Our family is everything. Her greatest skill was encouraging me to find my own person and own independence.
3221.author: Charlize Theron

3222.quote: Skype is easy enough to use so that people don't need to be tech savvy - a lot of users just want to communicate with their friends and family, and they find this is the easiest, cheapest way.
3222.author: Niklas Zennstrom

3223.quote: The dream was not to put one black family in the White House, the dream was to make everything equal in everybody's house.
3223.author: Al Sharpton

3224.quote: In a big family the first child is kind of like the first pancake. If it's not perfect, that's okay, there are a lot more coming along.
3224.author: Antonin Scalia

3225.quote: A plague on eminence! I hardly dare cross the street anymore without a convoy, and I am stared at wherever I go like an idiot member of a royal family or an animal in a zoo; and zoo animals have been known to die from stares.
3225.author: Igor Stravinsky

3226.quote: Long before we understand ourselves through the process of self-examination, we understand ourselves in a self-evident way in the family, society and state in which we live.
3226.author: Hans-Georg Gadamer

3227.quote: I think that's become passe, but if you can surround yourself with a kind of monument to yourself and your family - a statement - and you can afford it, then that's a noble project.
3227.author: Sylvester Stallone

3228.quote: I find that it's the simple things that remind you of family around the holidays.
3228.author: Amy Adams

3229.quote: Marriage is an act of will that signifies and involves a mutual gift, which unites the spouses and binds them to their eventual souls, with whom they make up a sole family - a domestic church.
3229.author: Pope John Paul II

3230.quote: To this day, just always treat people the way you want to be treated. Whether it's family or friends or co-workers, I think it's the most important thing. Whether you have success or don't have it, whether you're a good person is all that matters.
3230.author: Brenda Song

3231.quote: It was the labor movement that helped secure so much of what we take for granted today. The 40-hour work week, the minimum wage, family leave, health insurance, Social Security, Medicare, retirement plans. The cornerstones of the middle-class security all bear the union label.
3231.author: Barack Obama

3232.quote: The dilemma for society is how to preserve personal and family values in a nation of diverse tastes.
3232.author: Tipper Gore

3233.quote: It's really important to me that my niece and nephews can come and see my show, as can my grandad and nan. I love spending time with my family, and music has always bonded us.
3233.author: Jessie J

3234.quote: Every day I wake up and I lay in bed counting my blessings and saying my prayers for how fortunate I am to have great fans and health and family.
3234.author: Luke Bryan

3235.quote: My mom's side of the family is from Arkansas!
3235.author: Kelli O'Hara

3236.quote: If I were to retire, I would keep my family's interest in the company the same and say, Don't sell.
3236.author: Sheldon Adelson

3237.quote: When it gets to the part in life where you're more afraid of what your wife is going to do to you than if you box, say, Mike Tyson, you've got to get a new profession. You don't get to be a family. I know why boxers never quit, some of them. They don't have wives.
3237.author: George Foreman

3238.quote: Our family room, where we live, is about togetherness and ease. Nothing in my house is too formal. There are no coasters on tables; the kids can eat Popsicles on the couch if they want to. I let them ride these little cycles we got for them when they were 3 that have rubber wheels and no pedals.
3238.author: Cindy Crawford

3239.quote: Only solitary men know the full joys of friendship. Others have their family; but to a solitary and an exile his friends are everything.
3239.author: Warren G. Harding

3240.quote: I like simple things. I like being in my family in the South and playing petanque.
3240.author: Jean Dujardin

3241.quote: I like playing music because it's a good living and I get satisfaction from it. But I can't feed my family with satisfaction.
3241.author: James Hetfield

3242.quote: My family was all born in Sicily and I'm Italian-American. They're the real thing. They're authentic Italians, and honestly they're the most open-minded, nicest people in the world and nothing can really offend them. That's the way I think true Sicilians are.
3242.author: Vinny Guadagnino

3243.quote: Polo is a great thing to do with your kids and your family - it is a great day out. And to me, horses are amazing creatures that give you this cable to Earth and put you in contact with nature.
3243.author: Nacho Figueras

3244.quote: I was in Yorkshire. We were a family of five and I used to be sent sometimes to get the rations for the week and I was easily able to carry them back. It was like one egg and a tiny bit of tea.
3244.author: Judi Dench

3245.quote: I grew up in a working-class family, so I guess you could say I write from what I know.
3245.author: Andrea Arnold

3246.quote: I'm always the cousin that can't make it to the family functions because I'm busy.
3246.author: Taraji P. Henson

3247.quote: Film is a much lonelier process than theatre. You really don't have any rehearsal time in film. You don't shape it together... with theatre, there is a complete kind of family atmosphere. The sociable side of this business is the theatrical side, it really isn't the film side.
3247.author: Keira Knightley

3248.quote: You're scrutinized all through your life - you're scrutinized by your family, by yourself, by society, and your friends in a certain way, shape, or form.
3248.author: Colin Farrell

3249.quote: A lot of parents never speak to their transgender kids again; that's not the case in my family.
3249.author: Chaz Bono

3250.quote: I never thought I'd be making a living off of acting - it's still kind of a shock for my family and friends to see my face on TV every Wednesday night.
3250.author: Matthew Gray Gubler

3251.quote: My off-the-field heroes, the people who gave me the values to live by and who inspired me with their hard work and unselfish dedication to their family, were my mom, Catherine, and my dad, William.
3251.author: Allan Ray

3252.quote: My family took me to church when I was like 4 years old, and I had to be in a pageant, and I was playing Jesus.
3252.author: David Walton

3253.quote: Skiing takes so much out of me, and when I start a family, I want to do it 100%.
3253.author: Lindsey Vonn

3254.quote: After 20 years in the game, I was fortunate to get away from the game and enjoy my family, which was great for me.
3254.author: Joe Sakic

3255.quote: I believe that the greatest gift you can give your family and the world is a healthy you.
3255.author: Joyce Meyer

3256.quote: My friends and family are my support system. They tell me what I need to hear, not what I want to hear and they are there for me in the good and bad times. Without them I have no idea where I would be and I know that their love for me is what's keeping my head above the water.
3256.author: Kelly Clarkson

3257.quote: I enjoy nothing more than spending time with my loved ones, young and old, and at least once a year we get together for a formal family photograph.
3257.author: Elliott Erwitt

3258.quote: Anyone with a heart, with a family, has experienced loss. No one escapes unscathed. Every story of separation is different, but I think we all understand that basic, wrenching emotion that comes from saying goodbye, not knowing if we'll see that person again - or perhaps knowing that we won't.
3258.author: Luanne Rice

3259.quote: God has blessed me with an amazing family, friends and work colleagues that have been my joy, my support, and my sanity. I don't know what I'd do without them.
3259.author: Josie Loren

3260.quote: I was on vacation with my family when I got the scripts for 'Wanderlust' and I was trying to work on the audition while I was on vacation. I remember a big gust of wind blew the entire script into the pool, so I had to dry it with a hairdryer.
3260.author: Kathryn Hahn

3261.quote: The things that make me happiest in the whole world are going on the occasional picnic, either with my children or with my partner; big family gatherings; and being able to go to the grocery store - if I can get those things in, I'm doing good.
3261.author: Kate Winslet

3262.quote: People ask why there are so few female artists who succeed. It's because women are not ready to sacrifice as much as men. Women want a man, they want a family, they want to have children, they want to be loved, and to be an artist. And they can't; it's impossible.
3262.author: Marina Abramovic

3263.quote: Being rich is a good thing. Not just in the obvious sense of benefitting you and your family, but in the broader sense. Profits are not a zero sum game. The more you make, the more of a financial impact you can have.
3263.author: Mark Cuban

3264.quote: The most important thing in the world is family and love.
3264.author: John Wooden

3265.quote: I grew up babysitting and always enjoyed it. I love family. A couple of my closest friends have kids, and I'm their godfather, and that's one of my greatest pleasures in life, just picking them up from school and hanging out with them.
3265.author: Matthew Perry

3266.quote: Let us nurture the practice of family values, by embracing policies that value families.
3266.author: Benjamin Todd Jealous

3267.quote: I'm satisfied with making true choices and finding the woman I love, Angie, and building a family that I love so much.
3267.author: Brad Pitt

3268.quote: There is good in everything; it's just how you choose to look at it. Everything that's worth it has a price. For me to be a model - I had to leave my family. Do you think I liked that? No! There are sacrifices. Life is meant to be a challenge, because challenges are what make you grow.
3268.author: Gisele Bundchen

3269.quote: I represent poor people, I represent working people. I represent senior citizens. I represent family businesses. I represent people who don't have the wherewithal to hire overpriced Washington lobbyists and lawyers. I want to send the powers back to the states and the people.
3269.author: Paul Broun

3270.quote: When you're a self-made man, you start very early in life. In my case it was at 9 years old when I started bringing income into the family. You get a drive that's a little different, maybe a little stronger, than somebody who inherited.
3270.author: Kirk Kerkorian

3271.quote: You know, I think I'm more of a micro-person, so to me, the context and the framework of trying to do what you love and feel passionate about, in supporting your family in that way, is the most important thing to me.
3271.author: Joan Cusack

3272.quote: My humanitarian work evolved from being with my family. My mom, my dad, they really set a great example for giving back. My mom was a nurse, my dad was a school teacher. But my mom did a lot of things for geriatrics and elderly people. She would do home visits for free.
3272.author: Cat Cora
